name: Asian Cup Soccer
description:
Score a game-winning goal with the whole stadium watching! Asian Cup Soccer is a free kick soccer game with one button control. In this stadium, the pressure is high, the crowd is loud, and every goal can decide the match. Pick one of Asia's top national teams like Japan, South Korea, India, Australia or UAE and step into the knockout round of a major tournament. It's fast, fun, and super easy to play. You don't need to know all the soccer rules. Just aim, shoot, and defend your goal when it's your turn.

Controls

Kick:

  • Click 1 : Aim
  • Click 2 : Set height
  • Click 3 : Add curve (optional)
  • Click 1 : Aim
  • Click 2 : Set height
  • Click 3 : Add curve (optional)

    • Goalkeeper:

    • Tap/click the gloves fast when they appear to block the shot!
  • Tap/click the gloves fast when they appear to block the shot!

    • How to Play Asian Cup Soccer

    First, pick your favorite team from a lineup of 12, each wearing their country's colors. You'll play through the Round of 16 and try to make it all the way to the championship match.

    Shooting

    When it's your turn to shoot, you'll see an arrow on the field. Click once to choose the direction, again for the height, and one more time if you want to curve the ball around the defenders. It's kind of like a mix between aiming in basketball and flicking a paper football but on a real field!

    Goalkeeping

    When the other team is shooting, it's your time to shine as the goalie. You'll see gloves pop up showing where the ball is going—click there quickly to block the shot.

    Score and Win

    Each match is a showdown; whoever scores the most wins and moves on. Your score gets tracked, and you can earn cool trophies like:

    • 1st Win
    • Finalist
    • Champion
    • Golden Boot (for scoring 20 goals)
  • 1st Win
  • Finalist
  • Champion
  • Golden Boot (for scoring 20 goals)

    • Developer

    This game was made by Deusx.

    More Soccer Games for Sports Fans

    If Asian Cup Soccer has you yelling "GOOOAAAL" at your screen, check out Penalty Challenge to face off against others online. Or try Soccer Simulator for full-on team matches with awesome 3D movement.

name: Gold Miner
description:
Gold Miner is a legendary flash game where you drop your claw, grab gold, and haul it up before time runs out. It's like you're fishing with a rod, except you're on the ground holding a hook and catching shiny rocks instead of fish this time. Each level gives you a money goal, and it's your job to collect shiny treasures like gold mines and diamonds. Avoid useless rocks, and make smart buys in the shop. One wrong drop and your claw will be busy pulling a worthless boulder while the clock ticks away. And yet, you'll keep coming back for one more round. It's a browser game that has kept its charm even after decades!

Controls

  • Drop Claw: Press the Down Arrow (↓) key when the swinging claw is lined up.
  • Toss Dynamite: Press the Up Arrow (↑) key after grabbing something you don't want.
  • Drop Claw: Press the Down Arrow (↓) key when the swinging claw is lined up.
  • Toss Dynamite: Press the Up Arrow (↑) key after grabbing something you don't want.

    • How to Play Gold Miner

    The claw swings back and forth. Time your drop to grab gold nuggets, bags, or diamonds.

    Big items like massive gold chunks or boulders take longer to pull up. Small gold is quicker but not as valuable.

    Each level has a timer and a money goal. Make smart grabs to beat the goal before time runs out.

    If you accidentally hooked a rock, press the up arrow to blow it up with dynamite. Dynamite is limited and costs money to restock.

    Explore the Shop

    Between levels, you'll stop by a small in-game shop where you can spend your gold money on helpful items. Here's what you can find:

    • Dynamite ($51): If you grab a rock or something slow and not worth the trouble, toss dynamite to blow it up. It can save your level, especially near the end when every second counts.
    • Lucky Clover ($14): This item boosts your chances of getting something valuable from the mystery bags (the ones with question marks). Only lasts for one level but it can pay off fast if you go after those bags.
    • Diamond Polish ($286): Makes diamonds worth more during the next level. It's expensive, but if there are diamonds on the map, it can really boost your score.
  • Dynamite ($51): If you grab a rock or something slow and not worth the trouble, toss dynamite to blow it up. It can save your level, especially near the end when every second counts.
  • Lucky Clover ($14): This item boosts your chances of getting something valuable from the mystery bags (the ones with question marks). Only lasts for one level but it can pay off fast if you go after those bags.
  • Diamond Polish ($286): Makes diamonds worth more during the next level. It's expensive, but if there are diamonds on the map, it can really boost your score.

    • Developer

    Originally a hit Flash game, Gold Miner was created by GameRival and released in 2003. It has been revived for modern browsers with the help of Flash Emulators and remains one of the most loved online arcade titles. You can play it right now, for free, on OnlineGames.io.

    Explore Old Flash Games

    If you love to deep dive into nostalgia with old Adobe Flash games, explore our collection OnlineGames.io. From Duck Life to Papa's games, Fancy Pants to Henry Stickmin, you can play your favorite flash game on modern browsers without downloading or installing a plugin!

name: Religious Idle
description:
Forge a fresh faith and watch it bloom! Religious Idle is a free online idle game that lets you start a brand-new religion from a single believer and grow it into a globe-spanning movement (and you won’t need to part seas to make it happen!) Click to recruit some followers, find a catchy name for the religion, choose a sacred symbol, and write the holy sacred words. As donations roll in, you’ll build temples, shrines, mega-temples, and even a towering Divine Monument. Every upgrade attracts more curious souls, turning your clicker into a self-sustaining empire of belief. If you love watching numbers rise while tweaking strategy on the side, this game delivers that satisfying idle loop with a playful twist on spirituality.

Controls

  • Desktop: Left-click to press any on-screen button (Recruit, Build, Assign, etc.).
  • Mobile: Tap those same buttons with your finger—perfect for quick blessings on the go.
  • Desktop: Left-click to press any on-screen button (Recruit, Build, Assign, etc.).
  • Mobile: Tap those same buttons with your finger—perfect for quick blessings on the go.

    • How to Play Religious Idle

    Hit Recruit Followers to convince your inner circle. The moment you cross the first milestone, give your movement a name, choose a logo, and pen some sacred words. Those touches boost morale and donations.

    Build Holy Ground

    Followers tithe automatically, so keep an eye on the green money counter. Spend cash on buildings that scale your reach:

    • Gathering Spot → Shrine → House of Worship → Mega Temple → Divine Monument.
    • Each tier increases follower capacity and unlocks new gameplay layers but you'll need to assign praichers to build temples.
  • Gathering Spot → Shrine → House of Worship → Mega Temple → Divine Monument.
  • Each tier increases follower capacity and unlocks new gameplay layers but you'll need to assign praichers to build temples.

    • Train Your Zealots

    With bigger buildings come dedicated roles. Assign unclaimed zealots as:

    • Recruiters: bring in 1 % extra believers each cycle.
    • Fundraisers: squeeze a few extra coins from every tithe.
    • Preachers: keep the faith alive inside large structures such as worship houses and mega temples.
    • Crusaders: they'll embark on expeditions for precious relics. Relics act like power-ups: double XP, speed up tithes, or flood your roster with bonus zealots. Use them wisely for explosive growth.
  • Recruiters: bring in 1 % extra believers each cycle.
  • Fundraisers: squeeze a few extra coins from every tithe.
  • Preachers: keep the faith alive inside large structures such as worship houses and mega temples.
  • Crusaders: they'll embark on expeditions for precious relics. Relics act like power-ups: double XP, speed up tithes, or flood your roster with bonus zealots. Use them wisely for explosive growth.

    • Explore Mail Feed

    Pop open the little envelope in the corner and you’ll find a stream of quirky headlines, miracle reports, and fan or foe letters. It's like Twitter for prophets. World news flashes like “The Sign of Maneizm Appears on a Piece of Toast in Georgia” or “Children Everywhere Look Forward to Annual Holy Day.” These short blurbs hint at your creed’s growing cultural footprint. Followers gush about everyday blessings, from finding lost keys to a balding believer who swears his hair grew back once he started tithing. Each feel-good story boosts the impact. And not everyone’s on board. Expect the odd grumpy letter about loud chanting at 3 a.m. or worries that your zealots are getting “too enthusiastic.” Negative press may slow recruitment, so keep the faithful happy.

    Developer

    Religious Idle is crafted by Kodiqi, the indie studio behind several cult-favorite clicker titles. Their trademark: clean UI, steady progression, and clever humor that keeps you grinning between clicks.

    More Idle Clicker Games You’ll Love

    If watching followers and funds snowball made your day, fire up Logistics Inc next. This free online game swaps holy buildings for delivery vehicles, letting you recruit staff, juggle budgets, and scale a transport empire from ten bucks to market dominance. Play now for free on OnlineGames.io!

name: War of Tanks Paper Note
description:
Grab your favorite doodle pen and dive straight into War of Tanks Paper Note. It's a free online tank game that looks like it was drawn during a very boring math class cuz this game is so FUN! Every line, laser fence, and armored turret is sketched on squared notebook paper. The action feels as intense as any full-blown arcade shooter. You'll guide a tiny hand-colored tank through mazes of spinning barriers, pencil-red laser grids, and enemy doodles that won't hesitate to erase you from the page. Plus, you can play against a friend on the same keyboard. This free game is wrapped in fun in a charming paper-craft style that makes the battlefield feel both nostalgic and brand-new.

Controls

Purple Tank (Player 1)

  • Move W / A / S / D
  • Shoot Space
  • Restart R
  • Move W / A / S / D
  • Shoot Space
  • Restart R

    • Green Tank (Player 2)

    • Move Arrow Keys
    • Shoot M
    • Restart R
  • Move Arrow Keys
  • Shoot M
  • Restart R

    • How to Play War of Tanks Paper Note

    Choose between 1 P and 2 P on the title page. In single-player, you face an obstacle course broken into three main zones, each gated by glowing red laser doors. Destroy marked targets, tanks, turrets, or clusters of foot soldiers to shut those lasers down and unlock the next area. Your green health bar at the top left shows how much scribbled armor you have left. When it empties, your tank gets crunched into paper scraps and the run ends.

    Solo Campaign

    Each zone contains five high-value targets. Pick them off in any order while weaving through cross-shaped barriers and timing your moves past rotating cannons. Projectiles travel only in the direction your tank is facing, so line up your turret before shooting. Some walls are thin enough to fire through; others bounce shots back, turning the page into a ricochet puzzle. Clear all fifteen targets across the three zones to complete the mission and claim the ruler-of-the-paper-note title!

    Grab Power-Ups

    Colored icons dot the battlefield, each granting an instant upgrade when you roll over it. In two-player mode, these bonuses spawn more often, so snag them fast or watch your friend grab the upper hand.

    • Armor adds a chunk to your health bar, letting you soak up extra damage.
    • Repair fully restores your tank
    • Bigger Bullet boosts shell size for wider impact.
    • Triple Shots fires a spread of three doodle rounds at once.
    • Rocket swaps your standard shell for a fast, splash-damage missile.
    • Laser unleashes a piercing beam that carves clean lines through enemies.
    • Freeze temporarily locks every hostile unit in place
    • Laser Inactivation turns off certain red grids
  • Armor adds a chunk to your health bar, letting you soak up extra damage.
  • Repair fully restores your tank
  • Bigger Bullet boosts shell size for wider impact.
  • Triple Shots fires a spread of three doodle rounds at once.
  • Rocket swaps your standard shell for a fast, splash-damage missile.
  • Laser unleashes a piercing beam that carves clean lines through enemies.
  • Freeze temporarily locks every hostile unit in place
  • Laser Inactivation turns off certain red grids

    • Developer

    War of Tanks Paper Note is created by NeplingameStudio.

name: Logistics Inc
description:
Ever dreamed of turning a tiny delivery startup into a globe-spanning shipping empire? Logistics Inc lets you do just that, right in your browser. Logistic Inc is an online idle game where you begin with only five employees, ten bucks in the bank, and a single bicycle courier. From there, every hire, upgrade, and marketing push is up to you. Juggle staff recruitment, Research & Development breakthroughs, marketing campaigns, and greasy-handed mechanics while the orders keep rolling in. It's the kind of management simulation game that feels almost like running a real business. Jump in for a quick coffee-break click-fest, and the next minute you'll find yourself settled in for a full strategy session. This free online game offers a rich, in-depth management experience that should be taught and played in business schools.

Controls

  • Mouse / Touch: Click or tap buttons to play
  • Mouse / Touch: Click or tap buttons to play

    • How to Play Logistics Inc

    Your first screen shows a single bicycle line with zero staff assigned, five fresh employees waiting in the wings, and a ten-dollar note in your pocket. Click the orange "BUY 1" button beside the bike row to purchase that initial ride. The moment you do, orders start to appear in the left-hand column, and the orange bar in the Status cell fills up with every completed delivery. Next, hit the plus sign in the Staff column to assign at least one worker to the bike. A staffed vehicle actually moves; an empty one just sits in the depot looking pretty.

    Expand the Fleet

    Bikes alone won't build an empire, so reinvest your earnings in new vehicle tiers. After buying 5 of a vehicle type, the next type unlocks. Vans, trucks, planes, and eventually ships appear. Buy at least one unit of a vehicle. Some vehicles, like planes and ships, require more than one worker to operate. Assign your workers, and watch the orders get completed. Remember that higher-tier vehicles accept bigger orders but drain more cash up front, so pace your purchases with your hiring rate.

    Manage Research and Development

    Staff are the game's true currency, and you'll juggle them constantly. Every employee you assign to a vehicle speeds up its order cycle, while those placed in departments unlock vital support systems. Early on, drop a worker into the HR panel. HR hires new staff automatically. Slower than you might like, but entirely free. When the orange timer under "STAFF RECRUIT" hits zero, a new recruit walks through the door. Decide where they'll work next. Don't leave any workers unassigned. If growth feels too slow, head into the Research & Development tree and increase the staff in the RD center to unlock the Contractors upgrade. Contractors allow you to trade cash for instant personnel. But they are not cheap!

    R&D is where the real snowball begins that deals with efficiencies that slash costs, speed up HR, and boost marketing power. Staff assigned here don't produce money directly, but every node they complete multiplies future income. It's usually smart to keep at least a small permanent team in R&D; the earlier you grab upgrades like Efficiency or Improved HR, the faster every other action in the game becomes.

    Hire Marketing Gurus

    Idle trucks mean lost profits, and the Marketing department makes sure that never happens. Open the Marketing Strategy window and drag staff into any of the colored bars representing bikes, vans, trucks, planes, or ships. Each marketing guru adds the order bonus written on the bar, and a running tally in the right-hand panel shows exactly what you're paying per staff member to double their output. Spreading a few people across multiple product lines keeps incoming orders balanced.

    Keep the Wheels Turning

    Vehicles wear down over time, and a sluggish fleet will choke profits. After hiring enough workers in the R&D center, you'll unlock Vehicle Maintenance. Here, hire mechanics by clicking plus signs beside empty slots. Each ride shows a maintenance fraction, bringing it to the maximum, and its speed instantly jumps to 100 percent. The Upskill buttons beside your mechanics let you train your mechanics to deal with more advanced vehicles. A bike mechanic cannot be tasked with planes without any training. They must be upskilled. But don't worry, training takes only a few seconds.  

    An Idle Tycoon Business

    As revenues climb, swap the purchase multiplier at the top of the main board from x1 to x10 or MAX to buy vehicles in bulk. Your ultimate endgame is a perfectly balanced dashboard: zero idle staff, queues brimming with orders, every wrench icon bright green, and a money counter that refuses to stop spinning. Once you've hit that rhythm, the only question left is how many zeros you want on your company valuation.

    Developer

    Logistics Inc. is crafted by Kodiqi.

    More Online Management Games

    Feel like testing your inner CEO further? Jump into Idle Startup Tycoon, another free browser game where production lines, research labs, and shipment routes need your expert touch. It shares the same quick-click upgrades and money-management loops that make Logistics Inc. Have fun growing your empire, and don't forget to drop a comment down below if your shipping operation reaches billionaire status!

name: Stick Fighter 3D
description:
Stick Fighter 3D is a neon-style, 1v1 fighting game where two glowing stick figures duke it out in a side-view arena. You can play solo against the CPU or locally with a friend on the same keyboard. Control stickman in combat, punch, kick, and perform special moves to knock your opponent out! Each player has a health bar and the round ends when one player's health is fully depleted. Flashy design, smooth animations, and a glowing aesthetic will catch your attention from the start. It's stickmen like you've never seen them before! Grab your keyboard, sit next to your buddy and start the battle!

Controls

Player 1 (Orange Stickman)

  • Move Left: A
  • Move Right: D
  • Jump: W
  • Punch: F
  • Kick: G
  • Special: R
  • Move Left: A
  • Move Right: D
  • Jump: W
  • Punch: F
  • Kick: G
  • Special: R

    • Player 2 (Blue Stickman)

    • Move Left: Left Arrow
    • Move Right: Right Arrow
    • Jump: Up Arrow
    • Punch: K
    • Kick: L
    • Special: O
  • Move Left: Left Arrow
  • Move Right: Right Arrow
  • Jump: Up Arrow
  • Punch: K
  • Kick: L
  • Special: O

    • How to Play Stick Fighter 3D

    Choose between solo (1P) or versus (2P) mode from the main screen. Once you're in:

    • Your goal is to finish your opponent's health bar by punching, kicking, and powerful specials.
    • The fight is over when one player's health bar is completely drained. Mix punches and kicks in combos for maximum damage.
    • Special moves give you an edge, but they take time to recharge!
    • Score points each time you win a round.
  • Your goal is to finish your opponent's health bar by punching, kicking, and powerful specials.
  • The fight is over when one player's health bar is completely drained. Mix punches and kicks in combos for maximum damage.
  • Special moves give you an edge, but they take time to recharge!
  • Score points each time you win a round.

    • Special Moves

    Every fighter has a powerful Special Move that can instantly take out their opponent, no matter how much health is left. But there's a catch: you can only use it when the bar above is fully charged. Watch both your own bar and your opponent's. When it fills up, a flash appears. That's your signal. Time it right, hit the special button, and instant KO. Just remember: if your rival's bar is full, you're the one in danger. Watch their movements and stay on guard, because one wrong step could mean a lost score.

    Similar 2P Games

    If you enjoyed the back-and-forth dueling of Stick Fighter 3D, you'll probably love Drunken Duel. It's another head-to-head fighting game, but this time, ragdolls are drunk. Choose your side and start dueling with your friend!

name: Epic Basketball
description:
Epic Basketball is a fun and quirky street-style sports game you can play right in your browser. It's all about how many baskets you can sink in just 60 seconds. If a basketball shootout game sounds too easy, think again because this hoop doesn't like to stay in one spot, and distractions are everywhere. Stay sharp, aim true, and shoot your shot!

Controls

  • Desktop: Hold down the left mouse button, drag to aim, and release to shoot.
  • Mobile: Tap and drag on the screen to set your angle release to launch the ball.
  • Desktop: Hold down the left mouse button, drag to aim, and release to shoot.
  • Mobile: Tap and drag on the screen to set your angle release to launch the ball.

    • How to Play Epic Basketball

    • You start by picking your player. At first, you'll play as Javi, a funky street baller with big hair and big dreams.
    • Once you're on the court, you'll face a single hoop. You have 60 seconds to begin with. Your goal is to score as many points as possible before time runs out.
    • Scoring isn't the only challenge. Each time you make a basket, the hoop moves. Sometimes farther, sometimes higher. You'll have to adjust your aim and force. The game uses a dotted arc to help you plan your shot, but mastering the rhythm takes practice.
    • A small extra hoop sometimes appears on the screen. If you score while it's active, you get bonus time!
  • You start by picking your player. At first, you'll play as Javi, a funky street baller with big hair and big dreams.
  • Once you're on the court, you'll face a single hoop. You have 60 seconds to begin with. Your goal is to score as many points as possible before time runs out.
  • Scoring isn't the only challenge. Each time you make a basket, the hoop moves. Sometimes farther, sometimes higher. You'll have to adjust your aim and force. The game uses a dotted arc to help you plan your shot, but mastering the rhythm takes practice.
  • A small extra hoop sometimes appears on the screen. If you score while it's active, you get bonus time!

    • Unlock Epic Basketball Players

    Start with Javi and unlock more colorful players like Plin Plin, Bubu, Patty Wally, Bruce, Alien, Neil, Imhotep and more. Each character has their own personality and look, but the real prize is Nona. She may look like a grandma, but she's the ultimate baller. To unlock Nona, you'll need to score 300 points. That's not easy, so get practicing!

    Next Play

    If you enjoyed Epic Basketball's energy and fun visuals, you'll love playing Basket Random. It's a 2-player basketball game with pixel characters and fast matches. Great for when you want to take your skills to an even funnier court with wicked physics.

name: Geometry Vibes X-Ball
description:
Geometry Vibes: X-Ball is a platformer game where you guide a glowing ball on an obstacle course filled with some spiky traps using only one button. You'll try to keep the X-Ball alive as it zips through neon platformer levels filled with sharp corners, instant-death spikes, and giant slopes. All you can do is tap. Tap to go upwards, release to flip direction. But that's more than enough to keep your heart racing. With a slick, futuristic design, this game is a love letter to classic Geometry Dash games, modernized for today's quick-play on browsers. And we've kept the best part: you can race with your friends on the same device. Test your focus, reaction time, and sense of rhythm as a group this time. And give that one friend who always wins an award (or at least bragging rights). So tap and vibe your way through one of the slickest browser games of the year. Play Geometry Vibes: X-Ball now on OnlineGames.io!

Controls

  • Hold tap or click: Move upwards.
  • Release tap or click: Move downwards.
  • Hold tap or click: Move upwards.
  • Release tap or click: Move downwards.

    • Game Modes

    Geometry Vibes: X-Ball offers four game modes, each with its own structure. Let's break down how each one works so you know what to expect when you press play.

    Classic Mode

    This is the core of the game: a single-player, level-based platformer challenge where your goal is to reach the finish line in one piece. There are 10 levels, each designed with precise layouts full of deadly spikes, angled walls, and narrow paths.

    • The X-Ball moves forward on a straight trajectory. Guide it by tapping and releasing taps. The faster you tap, the straighter it goes.
    • You'll have to time your taps carefully to avoid spikes along the top and bottom. Some levels also have square or triangle blocks positioned to trick your timing.
    • The level previews show increasing complexity, tight corridors, sudden slope shifts, and spike traps placed directly above and below.
    • The progression bar at the top shows how close you are to the end.
    • Touch anything that's not the safe platform line, and it's an instant restart.
  • The X-Ball moves forward on a straight trajectory. Guide it by tapping and releasing taps. The faster you tap, the straighter it goes.
  • You'll have to time your taps carefully to avoid spikes along the top and bottom. Some levels also have square or triangle blocks positioned to trick your timing.
  • The level previews show increasing complexity, tight corridors, sudden slope shifts, and spike traps placed directly above and below.
  • The progression bar at the top shows how close you are to the end.
  • Touch anything that's not the safe platform line, and it's an instant restart.

    • Race Mode (2P–4P Local Multiplayer)

    Bring your friends in for some chaotic fun! In Race Mode, up to 4 players compete locally on the same keyboard or device. Each player selects their spinner from the customization menu, choosing both skin and trail effects for visual clarity. Controls are split:

    • P1 uses Mouse or space.
    • P2 uses Up arrow key
    • P3 uses H
    • P4 uses L
  • P1 uses Mouse or space.
  • P2 uses Up arrow key
  • P3 uses H
  • P4 uses L

    • You'll race across the same spike-filled levels seen in Classic Mode, but now it's about survival. Fall into a spike or mess up a turn, and you lose the match. There is no respawn. The goal is to reach the end of the level first. There are 10 levels, and each one increases the chaos. This mode turns Geometry Vibes: X-Ball into a party game, perfect for school breaks, family gaming sessions, or group challenges with friends.

    Endless Mode

    This mode is all about survival and distance. There's no ending: your job is to see how far you can go before you crash. Your score is measured in meters, and it's saved as your best record. The speed increases gradually the longer you survive, adding tension as you go. This mode is great for practicing your muscle memory.

    Challenge Mode

    This is where things get intense. You're given 5 unique levels with faster movement, tighter spaces, and shorter paths. Pressure gets even more intense here. Levels are locked behind progress, so you must beat the current one to unlock the next. The obstacles are denser here. Expect wall-to-wall spikes with minimal breathing room and fast direction changes. From normal difficulty to extreme and even "insane" levels, this mode will challenge even skilled gamers.

    Game Features

    • 4 exciting modes: Classic, Endless, Challenge, and Local Multiplayer
    • 10 levels in Classic and Race modes
    • 5 extra-tough levels in Challenge mode
    • One-button gameplay
    • Unlockable skins and trail effects from the in-game shop
    • Local multiplayer support for up to 4 players
    • Language support for:
      • English
      • Turkish
      • German
      • Spanish
      • Arabic
      • Portuguese
  • 4 exciting modes: Classic, Endless, Challenge, and Local Multiplayer
  • 10 levels in Classic and Race modes
  • 5 extra-tough levels in Challenge mode
  • One-button gameplay
  • Unlockable skins and trail effects from the in-game shop
  • Local multiplayer support for up to 4 players
  • Language support for:
    • English
    • Turkish
    • German
    • Spanish
    • Arabic
    • Portuguese
    • English
    • Turkish
    • German
    • Spanish
    • Arabic
    • Portuguese
  • English
  • Turkish
  • German
  • Spanish
  • Arabic
  • Portuguese

    • More Online Arcade Games

    If you liked this game, try out Geometry Dash, another rhythm platformer game where you jump, dodge, and groove to the beat. Or load Extreme Run 3D and tilt and dodge your way through neon obstacles at extreme speeds. These games will scratch that itch for high-energy, sharp-reflex gameplay. The same kind that makes Geometry Vibes: X-Ball so good!

name: Car Parking City Duel
description:
Car Parking City Duel is a free online driving game where you can play solo or on split-screen with a friend. It has a 3D open-world city and combines realistic driving physics with a variety of fun game modes. So, you're not limited to just parking. This game also lets you race through traffic, drift, crash into cars, complete timed missions, and freely explore the map without rules.

What makes this car game stand out is how it wraps up different driving games into one big package. So, let's say you want to show off your drifting skills. There's a mode for that. Want to just roam the city and mess around? You can do that too. There's even a crash mode where smashing into other cars actually earns you points.

You earn coins by completing tasks or collecting money bags randomly scattered on the map. Head to the garage to unlock better, faster cars with your coins. Solo or local two-player. Mission-based or free roam. Your rules, your game. Car Parking City Duel offers something for every kind of driving fan.

Controls

Player 1

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Switch Camera: C
  • NOS: Left Shift
  • Brake: Space
  • Restart: R
  • Look Back: T
  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Switch Camera: C
  • NOS: Left Shift
  • Brake: Space
  • Restart: R
  • Look Back: T

    • Player 2

    • Move: Arrow keys
    • Switch Camera: K
    • NOS: O
    • Brake: P
    • Restart: U
    • Look Back: L
  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Switch Camera: K
  • NOS: O
  • Brake: P
  • Restart: U
  • Look Back: L

    • Race with Friends

    Race mode puts you on the starting line against your friend and two CPU-controlled cars. There are 10 unique tracks designed with tight corners, city traffic, and open stretches. The first to cross the finish line wins, but if you crash or fall behind early, catching up can be tough. Timing your NOS boost and cornering correctly can make all the difference.

    Missions Mode

    Test your parking precision with timed goals in 20 different realistic parking scenarios. These aren't just casual drop-offs. You'll need to maneuver around tight corners, avoid barriers, and complete the parking mission before the clock runs out. Every bump damages your car, so be gentle. Your health bar on the top right of your screen is always watching.

    Parking Challenges

    This is where things get really specific. You'll need to drive through small checkpoints and park perfectly in highlighted spots. It's a true test of control, and every level gets more complex, and the time limit shrinks. You'll need patience. You'll perform some smooth operations here.

    Crash Mode

    In Crash Mode, your mission is to hit as many cars as possible. Every crash earns you points. And even if you slightly bump, the other cars explode. It's like playing with the tank in GTA. The more cars you explode, the more coins you'll get when the round ends. It's not about speed, but it's about destruction and smart targeting.

    Overtake Challenges

    Speed through busy traffic lanes and overtake civilian cars without crashing. Each overtake adds to your score so you can drive with better sports cars in the next run. It's one of the most rewarding modes of all.

    Drift Mode

    Speed over 80 km and steer sharply to pull off long drifts around corners and collect drift points. You'll need smooth entries, tight control, and the ability to maintain your angle without slamming into walls. Rack up a high score and prove your drifting skills. If you need a guide on how to drift, read our article on drift games online.

    Free Roam

    No goals. No pressure. Just you and the city. Drive wherever you want, explore ramps, jump off rooftops, take in the scenery, or practice tricks. This mode is great for experimenting or just relaxing between intense challenges. If you want, collect some money bags on the street.

    Features

    • 7 different game modes
    • Split-screen 2-player mode or solo play
    • Coin system lets you unlock new, faster cars
    • Vehicle health bar
    • Realistic drifting and crash physics
    • Richly detailed 3D city environment
    • Multiple language support
  • 7 different game modes
  • Split-screen 2-player mode or solo play
  • Coin system lets you unlock new, faster cars

    Car Parking City Duel was developed by RHM Interactive, known for making competitive and co-op games perfect for browser play. They've mastered the split-screen formula, and it shows here that every mode feels tailor-made for two players or solo fun.

    If you enjoy city driving in Car Parking City Duel, you'll want to try other traffic games or parking games on OnlineGames.io. We have lots of titles, each offering a unique urban driving experience, letting you explore the city while completing stunts, missions, or simply cruising with realistic traffic. They're all playable online for free. So fuel up, grab a friend, and hit the road.

name: Ultimate Moto
description:
Does gaming feel overwhelming lately? Big-budget titles flood us with complex controls, hundreds of features, and graphics so detailed they're exhausting to follow. Sometimes you end up feeling stressed just trying to keep up instead of feeling relaxed.

In all that noise, what many of us truly crave is the simplicity of arcade mechanics. Think of Pac-Man. Pure addictive fun that stands for decades. When the core is fun, the game doesn't need a fancy package. So sometimes, the best online games are the ones that are easy on the eyes, quick to learn, and instantly fun to play.

Ultimate Moto was created exactly with this kind of mentality. This game strips gaming back down to the basics with its minimalist neon visuals, sharp and clean lines, and easy mechanics. Forget 5 different kinds of in-game coins, menus packed with hundreds of confusing options, endless tutorials, or overly complex storylines. Here, it's all about getting right onto the neon-lit track and controlling your bike with arrow keys. And enjoying smooth jumps and satisfying flips.

If you're looking for a break from the gaming clutter, Ultimate Moto provides what you've been looking for. This fun little game throws you into a glowing track full of loops, ramps, and sparkly gems to collect. Choose your bike, upgrade your engine, and zoom through challenging levels with style. Each level is a new obstacle course, and your goal is to stay upright on the bike. Hit start, speed ahead, and reach the finish line without crashing.

How to Play Ultimate Moto

Your mission is to reach the finish line without tipping over. Along the way, grab as many diamonds as you can. These gems are your currency to buy new bikes and engine upgrades. Each level gets a bit trickier, with steeper hills, longer jumps, and tighter timing. If you flip in the air, you get an extra three diamonds. And if you crash, just restart instantly and try that level again.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Developer

Ultimate Moto is developed by FreezeNova Games and released in 2021.

More Free Bike Games to Try

If Ultimate Moto brings back that feeling for you, let us know! Drop a comment, tell us how far you've made it, or which neon bike is your favorite. We'd love to hear your thoughts. And if you enjoyed Ultimate Moto, have a look at the other free bike games we have on OnlineGames.io . We publish new games each week. So bookmark this site and don't miss out on new games.

name: GT Cars City Racing
description:
GT Cars City Racing is a fun 3D driving game where you can race solo or compete with a friend in split-screen mode. The game packs up everything you love in car games: super sport GT cars, a sandbox mode with a great playground, head-to-head races and robot wars!

In the sandbox mode, which is called Toy City, you drive through a colorful sandbox filled with fun mini-games like knocking over bowling pins, smashing robots, or jumping into pools. Face to Face is a competitive race mode where your car changes every lap, challenging you to adapt quickly and finish all five laps before your rivals. Mega Ramps throws you into a time-based race where a giant robot tries to destroy your car as you speed down massive ramps. GT Cars City Racing also lets you customize your GT car with different colors and effects. You can even paint the rims! With its bright 3D visuals, wild stunts, quick load times and fun challenges, GT Cars City Racing will be your next obsession!

Controls

Player 1:

  • Move: WASD
  • Nitro: Shift
  • Repair: R
  • Camera: C
  • Move: WASD
  • Nitro: Shift
  • Repair: R
  • Camera: C

    • Player 2:

    • Move: Arrow Keys
    • Nitro: N
    • Repair: U
    • Camera: K
  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Nitro: N
  • Repair: U
  • Camera: K

    • Game Modes Explained

    There are three different game modes + customization garage in the GT Cars City Racing. 

    Toy City

    This is where the real fun begins. Toy City is a sandbox-style mode full of short missions and mini-games. The entire map feels like a giant toy playset! Each mission in Toy City is designed to be quick, fun, and physics-based. These missions are all about experimenting, having fun, and earning money while doing fun stunts. You can play them at your own pace and replay your favorites. It's the perfect mode if you want to take a break from racing and just goof around in a fun, colorful world. Here's what you can expect:

    • Destroy the Robot: You aim your car at a giant toy robot and slam into it until it breaks apart. Parts go flying everywhere!
    • Jump into the Pool: There's a big ramp that sends your car soaring into a pool. If you land it right, you get a splashy reward. It's one of the funnier missions.
    • Knock Over Buildings: Some missions have you crash into huge bouncy balls that knock over blocky toy buildings like dominoes.
    • Collect Diamonds: You'll drive through paths filled with glowing, floating diamonds. The more you collect, the more in-game money you earn to customize your ride.
    • Fly Through Rings: These rainbow-colored hoops are floating in the air. Use ramps to launch your car and steer through the rings in mid-air.
    • Scatter Balloons: Hit special crates that explode with balloons when your car smashes into them. It's chaotic and colorful!
    • Bowling Challenge: Try to push giant balls into bowling pins or just drive straight into them yourself. Either way, the goal is to knock them all down.
  • Destroy the Robot: You aim your car at a giant toy robot and slam into it until it breaks apart. Parts go flying everywhere!
  • Jump into the Pool: There's a big ramp that sends your car soaring into a pool. If you land it right, you get a splashy reward. It's one of the funnier missions.
  • Knock Over Buildings: Some missions have you crash into huge bouncy balls that knock over blocky toy buildings like dominoes.
  • Collect Diamonds: You'll drive through paths filled with glowing, floating diamonds. The more you collect, the more in-game money you earn to customize your ride.

  • Bowling Challenge: Try to push giant balls into bowling pins or just drive straight into them yourself. Either way, the goal is to knock them all down.

    • Face to Face Race Mode

    Ready for a proper race? In this mode, you'll speed toward the finish line, and once you reach it, you'll switch cars (like a truck, mini SUV, or sports car), and your next lap begins instantly. You'll go through 5 vehicle swaps. First to complete all 5 wins!

    Mega Ramps

    In this time trial race mode, you drive down massive ramps while a giant robot tries to stop you. It might throw stuff at you or damage your car directly. If your health bar hits zero, your car falls off the edge or time runs out, you're out! Can you survive this madness and cross the finish line?

    Customize Your Ride

    If you want a fiery red GT over a glowing blue sports car with neon rims, it's all here. Now, head to the Customize tab on main menu and make your car look exactly how you want. You can:

    • Change body paint, rim color, windows, and lights
    • Pick cool nitro effects and flashy tail colors
    • Watch ads to unlock gems or cash for upgrades
  • Change body paint, rim color, windows, and lights
  • Pick cool nitro effects and flashy tail colors
  • Watch ads to unlock gems or cash for upgrades

    GT Cars City Racing is created by GameVGames, known for bright, accessible, and over-the-top driving games. 

    More 3D Driving Games Online

    If you're into stunt driving and arcade-style races, you'll love Crazy Car Arena. It features massive jumps, tricky obstacle tracks, and weirdly fun cars to unlock. Perfect for fans of Mega Ramps or Toy City mayhem! With fun toylike maps, lots of game modes, and two player split-screen feature, GT Cars City Racing is your new go-to browser game for laughs, races, and stunt madness. So buckle up, customize your ride, and play it free now on OnlineGames.io!

name: The Smurfs Cooking
description:
The Smurfs are back, and this time, they are in the kitchen! The Smurfs Cooking is a fun cooking game where you help Chef Smurf whip up the best cupcakes and snacks for the annual Smurf Food Festival. But he's in a bit of a smurfy pickle. He hasn't thought of a recipe yet! So it's up to you to jump behind the counter, serve hungry Smurfs, and keep the food flowing before the timer runs out.

If you love cooking games or just want to hang out with your favorite little blue friends, this sweet challenge will have you hooked. Muffins, whipped cream, juice, and cupcakes… it's all here!

Controls

  • Mouse / Touch: Tap or click to select ingredients, drag them to the plate, or serve Smurfs.
  • Mouse / Touch: Tap or click to select ingredients, drag them to the plate, or serve Smurfs.

    • How to Play The Smurfs Cooking

    • Your goal is to complete each level by serving food and earning enough berries to move on. Smurfs will line up with dessert orders shown above their heads. Each order may include plain muffins, ones with whipped cream or jam, or a drink.
    • Take some batter and pour it into the oven to bake muffins. When they're cooked, click on them to take them to a plate. They get burned if you leave them in the oven.
    • Top them with cream or jam using the bowls on the table. Make sure to match the orders exactly.
    • Once ready, click on the items to serve the Smurf who ordered them. They'll only wait a limited time before getting impatient!
    • Every correct order gives you berries. The level goal shows how many you need to pass. For example, in Level 5, you need to earn 160 berries.
    • As you progress, unlock special boosters or upgrade your kitchen with Handy Smurf. You can unlock time extenders or auto-serve helpers to make the kitchen a bit less chaotic.
  • Your goal is to complete each level by serving food and earning enough berries to move on. Smurfs will line up with dessert orders shown above their heads. Each order may include plain muffins, ones with whipped cream or jam, or a drink.

  • As you progress, unlock special boosters or upgrade your kitchen with Handy Smurf. You can unlock time extenders or auto-serve helpers to make the kitchen a bit less chaotic.

    • Keep in Mind, Chef Smurf!

    • Always keep your ovens baking while you serve other customers. Idle time is your enemy!
    • Focus on the Smurfs with the shortest patience bars first, they leave quickly if ignored.
    • Combine ingredients fast: memorize which topping goes with which plate to reduce delays.
    • Don't forget to claim rewards! Watching short videos can earn you gifts like extra boosters.
    • Use your sugar cubes wisely. They're premium items and unlock extra content.

name: Sword Play Ninja Slice Runner
description:
Grab your katana and get ready to slice your way through waves of enemies! Sword Play Ninja Slice Runner is an action runner game where you become a blade-wielding ninja on a high platform filled with enemies. You'll be slicing flying shurikens, bullets, shields or dodging massive bullets, just with your fingers moving.

The game throws you into a simple but colorful 3D world that changes in each level. Complete sword fights, slicing action, and enjoy satisfying slow-motion effects. It’s a mix of Fruit Ninja’s slicing satisfaction and the fun of endless runners.

Controls

  • Swipe on the screen to slash enemies and obstacles.
  • Hold and drag to control your sword’s direction.
  • Timing and precision are everything!
  • Swipe on the screen to slash enemies and obstacles.
  • Hold and drag to control your sword’s direction.

    • Time your moves to dodge traps like swinging axes or bullets.
    • Finish each level by defeating the final enemy or completing a stylish slow-motion slash. Along the way, you'll face:
    • Shielded enemies who need multiple hits.
    • Special weapons like dual katanas or energy blades.
    • Satisfying cinematic slow-mo kills that make you feel like a true ninja.

    • A jagged flame-shaped sword (your default)

name: Red Light Green Light
description:
Red Light Green Light is a game from the famous TV series Squid Game, and it is definitely one of the most iconic scenes. In this children game, players stand behind a starting line and must reach a finish line at the far end of the field. A giant, creepy doll stands at the finish line. It turns its back to the players and says "Green light!" This means players can move. Then, when it suddenly says "Red light!" and turns around. And players must freeze immediately. If the doll sees someone still moving during "Red light," that player is eliminated (and in Squid Game, elimination is done by shooting the player).

In this online video game version of Red Light Green Light on OnlineGames.io, you'll be put in the tracksuit of a numbered contestant and dropped into a deadly playground. Movement can mean either survival or death. Nothing in between. So hit the play button and enjoy the same thrill 456 lived in the first episode!

Controls

  • PC:
    • Hold the Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to run
    • Release to stop when the doll turns
  • Mobile:
    • Tap and hold to move, release to stop
  • PC:
    • Hold the Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to run
    • Release to stop when the doll turns
    • Hold the Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to run
    • Release to stop when the doll turns
  • Hold the Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to run
  • Release to stop when the doll turns
  • Mobile:
    • Tap and hold to move, release to stop
    • Tap and hold to move, release to stop
  • Tap and hold to move, release to stop

    • How to Play Red Light Green Light

    • Start by entering your name to join the round.
    • Line up with dozens of other players, all dressed in green tracksuits with their unique numbers.
    • When the doll looks away, run toward the red line by tapping and holding. The moment she turns back release the tap and freeze instantly.
    • If you get caught moving during "Red Light," and you're eliminated on the spot.
    • Make it to the finish line within the time limit to win and play the next round until you win the big prize. 
    • If you want to stand out from the crowd, unlock different hats and headgears in the shop.
  • Start by entering your name to join the round.
  • Line up with dozens of other players, all dressed in green tracksuits with their unique numbers.

  • If you get caught moving during "Red Light," and you're eliminated on the spot.
  • Make it to the finish line within the time limit to win and play the next round until you win the big prize. 
  • If you want to stand out from the crowd, unlock different hats and headgears in the shop.

    • Tips & Tricks for Red Light, Green Light

    • Watch the doll's head closely; her body starts turning a second before she says, "Red Light."
    • Stay calm when the timer is close to running out. Panic leads to mistakes.
    • Don't try to sprint the whole way. Stop-start rhythm is your best strategy.
    • Save up your coins to unlock cool hats that make your player stand out!

name: Apocalypse Truck
description:
When the virus hit, cities crumbled, people vanished. The world went silent except for the groans of the undead. You’re one of the few survivors of zombie apocalypse. Your only hope is a beat-up monster truck, with some spikes, plates, and just enough horsepower to push through the zombie chaos. This is your last chance to escape the city ruins. Fuel up, slam the pedal, and drive through waves of the undead in this thrilling side-scrolling zombie survival game!

Apocalypse Truck is a 2D driving game where you roam in a post apocalypse town, run over zombies and race to the finish line. Besides surviving the zombie apocalypse with wheels, spikes you will also launch off wrecked cars, perform mid air flips and and grab coins as you go. Are you into monster truck flips? Destruction? Flattening some zombies? Ok, don't wait! Start playing this fun game on our browser.

Controls

  • Arrow keys / WASD: Drive and balance your truck
  • Mouse: Tap through menus or select levels
  • Mobile players can use touch buttons to control the truck.
  • Arrow keys / WASD: Drive and balance your truck

    • Start by selecting the first level on the locked map. Levels unlock as you progress.
    • Your goal is to reach the finish line without losing all your health.
    • Use the arrow keys to accelerate and balance your truck on rough terrain. Jump the car using the up arrow or W key.
    • Zombies will be in your way; run them over for fun and coin rewards.
    • Perform front or back flips during big jumps to earn 3 bonus coins for each one.
    • If your truck lands upside down and stays flipped, your health bar drains fast. Don’t panic; press the up arrow and maneuver to flip back quickly!
    • Gather coins on the road. These coins let you unlock cooler and stronger trucks from the garage.
    • Replay levels to collect more coins and master your flips.

With 30 levels of zombie action, it’s a different kind of zombie game online!

name: PacXon New Realms
description:
Remember Paxcon? The classic wall-closing puzzle from the 2000s?.

If the answer is a big yes, the wait is over my friend, because PacXon: New Realms is here now. And it's out and bolder than ever. In this sequel to arcade classic PacXon Deluxe, with a full-on expansion loaded with new realms, enemies, skins, and power-ups, you'll get that pixelated fun with a modern twist.

Conquer by drawing walls, dodge tricky mines, and carve out territory with style. It's part strategy, part action, and all satisfying (especially when you trap those pesky enemies in a corner and watch the progress bar tick up to 80%.) In case you're new to world of PacXon, here’s a quick Arcade 101 refresher:

What is PacXon?

PacXon (sometimes written as Pac-Xon) is a fun arcade-style puzzle game that mixes mechanics from classic games like Pac-Man and Xonix. In this fun game, you play as Pacxon, a little PacMan-like character, but instead of eating dots, your goal is to fill up the screen by building walls. As you move, Pacxon leaves a trail behind him. If you can successfully close off a section of the screen, that area becomes filled in. The goal is to fill at least 80% of the screen to complete the level. PacXon was originally a Flash game released in 2007, but 18 years later, an HTML5 version was published so it can be played online without plugins.

Controls

  • Arrow keys/ drag mouse: Move PacXon in four directions
  • Mouse swipe: For touchscreen and drag-based input
  • Arrow keys/ drag mouse: Move PacXon in four directions
  • Mouse swipe: For touchscreen and drag-based input

    • How to Play PacXon: New Realms

    Your goal is to capture at least 80% of the field to move on. Yellow dots are shared open spaces, and orange dots are your territory. At the beginning of the level, all four sides are yours. You will run over open space to create a wall trail and loop back to a captured area to close the trail and claim that section. Then, it will turn into orange dots, marking your territory.

    If an enemy touches you or your trail before you finish the loop, you lose a life. Keep track of your lives on the bottom left. Keep an eye on the progress bar at the top to know how close you are to finishing the level.

    Types of Enemies

    Each level features ghostly enemies with different movement patterns. You'll need to study their patterns and strike at the right moment to grab territory without losing lives.

    • Blue enemies: Move diagonally in captured zones.
    • Pink enemies: Move diagonally in open space.
    • Red enemies: The most aggressive: they move diagonally and destroy the walls you've built.
  • Blue enemies: Move diagonally in captured zones.
  • Pink enemies: Move diagonally in open space.
  • Red enemies: The most aggressive: they move diagonally and destroy the walls you've built.

    • Grab Power-Ups

    Collect sweet treats on the map for powerful boosts:

    • 🍬 (Candy): Eat enemies temporarily
    • 🍩 (Donut): Speed boost
    • 🍰 (Cake): Enemies move slower
    • 🧁 (Cupcake): Enemies freeze for a short time
  • 🍬 (Candy): Eat enemies temporarily
  • 🍩 (Donut): Speed boost
  • 🍰 (Cake): Enemies move slower
  • 🧁 (Cupcake): Enemies freeze for a short time

    • PacXon New Realms Features

    • 192 handcrafted levels across 4 distinct environments
    • Revamped UI with cleaner menus and game flow
    • Pixel-style visuals with adorable animations
    • New soundtrack with upbeat tunes for every zone
    • Character skins to unlock: 4 to 6 per world!
    • Enemies with unique AI patterns
    • Playable on desktop or mobile with intuitive controls
  • 192 handcrafted levels across 4 distinct environments
  • Revamped UI with cleaner menus and game flow
  • Pixel-style visuals with adorable animations
  • New soundtrack with upbeat tunes for every zone
  • Character skins to unlock: 4 to 6 per world!
  • Enemies with unique AI patterns
  • Playable on desktop or mobile with intuitive controls

    PacXon: New Realms is the official sequel to the beloved PacXon Deluxe. This upgraded version brings back the old-school challenge with a fresh look. It's distributed by Azerion Casual Games. You can play it online for free now at OnlineGames.io.

    What to Play Next?

    Love the blend of retro vibes and quick reactions? Try Pac-Man 30th Anniversary. It's a faithful tribute to the dot-munching, ghost-dodging original, now updated for browser play. It's perfect for fans of maze strategies and classic tension. Google PacMan is a full-blown pixel quest that's equal parts nostalgic and new. Play now!

name: Crazy Motorcycle
description:
If Minecraft ever had a wild cousin who ditched mining for motorbikes, Crazy Motorcycle would be it. In this crazy bike game, you'll take a Minecraft-style noob (we call him Nubik), give him a shiny motorcycle, and drop into a floating obstacle course in the sky. There are no roads, no rules, and definitely no safety rails. Just pure blocky platformer. That's the energy this game brings.

It's almost like a kid built a racetrack in creative mode, added a few too many stone walls and trees, and then dared you to race through it with a bike. You'll recognize the pixelated grass blocks, chunky trees, mossy stone pillars, ice blocks and floating islands. Even though the theme feels like it's pulled straight out of a Minecraft server, there's no building or mining mode here. Your job is to dodge, jump, and reach the red portal at the end of the level. And there's something extra funny about seeing this square-headed daredevil wipe out in the most dramatic ways. So start playing Crazy Motorcycle now, and then you'll want to play again and again.

Controls

PC:

  • Move: W / A / S / D or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Move: W / A / S / D or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Spacebar

    • Mobile:

    • Use the on-screen joystick and buttons to steer and jump.
  • Use the on-screen joystick and buttons to steer and jump.

    • How to Play Crazy Motorcycle

    • Your mission is to drive the noob to the red portal block without crashing.
    • Each level is a floating track in the sky. If you fall off, you'll start from the last flag.
    • You'll face tight turns, sudden jumps, moving obstacles and a forest of stone pillars and trees.
    • Drive carefully without crashing your bike. The red target cube marks your finish line. Touch it to complete the level and unlock the next challenge.
  • Your mission is to drive the noob to the red portal block without crashing.
  • Each level is a floating track in the sky. If you fall off, you'll start from the last flag.
  • You'll face tight turns, sudden jumps, moving obstacles and a forest of stone pillars and trees.
  • Drive carefully without crashing your bike. The red target cube marks your finish line. Touch it to complete the level and unlock the next challenge.

    • Developer

    Crazy Motorcycle is a browser-based platformer game built by AM-Games. If you've played other "Noob" or voxel racing titles, you'll feel right at home. The developers focused on making a challenging but playful experience with short levels and instant retries.

    More Platformer Games You'll Love

    If Crazy Motorcycle grabbed your attention, try Obby But You're on a Bike. It's another sky adventure where you ride and jump and try not to fall off platforms. But this time, it has a Roblox-inspired theme instead of Minecraft. Perfect if you enjoy stunt games with a side of comedy.

name: Kick the Pirate
description:
Ahoy matey! Pirates may be brave on the high seas, but they’ve never met you. In Kick the Pirate, your job is simple: turn this grumpy pirate into your personal punching bag.  He’s muttering curses or just standing there looking smug. But it’s oddly satisfying to send him flying with a cannonball. Seriously. Bad day at school? Boss annoyed you? This destroy game is the perfect way to blow off some steam without flipping a table.

Stress-Busting Clicker Game

Some games make you think. Others make you feel. And this one? It just lets you kick a pirate with a cannon. And honestly, that’s all we needed today. In case you still have some steam left to blow off, we have a full collection of dummy games. You can kick the alien who tries to colonize your planet with some laser guns and sci-fi weapons. Or perhaps you may want to beat an Evil Santa who keeps the gifts to himself instead of giving them away. Oh, you still need more? Write "Kick the" in the search bar or go and explore all destroying games we have!  

Controls

  • Click or tap to attack the pirate.
  • Use earned coins to unlock more weapons.
  • Toggle settings in the top right for sound and blood effects.
  • Click or tap to attack the pirate.
  • Use earned coins to unlock more weapons.
  • Toggle settings in the top right for sound and blood effects.

    • How to Play Kick the Pirate

    • Start by clicking or tapping the pirate as fast (or as furiously) as you like.
    • Each hit earns you coins, which you’ll use to buy new weapons.
    • Your goal is to deplete the pirate’s health bar ( at the bottom) to complete each level.
    • As you progress, the levels get tougher and the pirate gets sassier.
    • You can swap out the ship’s background if you want a change of scene. Click on the button on the bottom left corner to shop new backgrounds.
    • If you’d prefer less graphic visuals, use the drop icon in the corner to toggle off the blood splatter.
  • Start by clicking or tapping the pirate as fast (or as furiously) as you like.

  • If you’d prefer less graphic visuals, use the drop icon in the corner to toggle off the blood splatter.

    • Weapons to Try

    There are tons of wacky weapons to unlock, each more satisfying than the last. You can switch between weapons using the buttons at the top of the screen. The stronger your weapons, the faster you can rack up coins and complete levels.

    • Flintlock Pistol: Classic and simple.
    • Bone Key Gun: Looks like it came straight out of a cursed treasure chest.
    • Battle Axe: Heavy damage and major pirate pain.
    • Ship Anchor: Watch him go flying.
    • Cannon: Boom! Need we say more?
    • TNT Barrel: Great for crowd control… or pirate control.
    • Rifle: Unlockable after a few rounds of brutal beating.

  • Battle Axe: Heavy damage and major pirate pain.
  • Ship Anchor: Watch him go flying.
  • Cannon: Boom! Need we say more?
  • TNT Barrel: Great for crowd control… or pirate control.

    • Developer

    Kick the Pirate was developed by FreezeNova with casual fun in mind. While it doesn’t take itself seriously, it delivers a surprisingly satisfying gameplay loop perfect for quick sessions or all-out pirate punishment marathons.

    Is Kick the Pirate Safe for Kids?

    While Kick the Pirate uses cartoon-style visuals and lets you toggle off blood effects, parents should know the core gameplay revolves around violence toward a pirate character. It’s meant to be humorous and exaggerated, not realistic. Recommended for players 10 and up with parental guidance if needed.

name: Julie Beauty Salon
description:
Julie Beauty Salon is a glam up makeover game where you run a beauty salon. Every makeover is a mini masterpiece in this fun, stylish browser game. You’re a beauty expert in charge of transforming a fabulous girl with bold makeup, trendy hairstyles, and colorful manicures. If you've ever dreamed of being a stylist or just love mixing and matching beauty looks, this free game is perfect for you.

Controls

  • Click or tap to select makeup tools, hairstyles, and nail polish.
  • Click or tap to select makeup tools, hairstyles, and nail polish.

    • How to Play Julie Beauty Salon

    • Ccomplete unique beauty routines one by one: makeup, hair styling, and nail art for three different girls.
    • Start by selecting the first part from the intro screen. Our girl needs a full transformation!
  • Ccomplete unique beauty routines one by one: makeup, hair styling, and nail art for three different girls.
  • Start by selecting the first part from the intro screen. Our girl needs a full transformation!

    • Start with Makeup

    • Pick a lipstick, swipe on colorful blush, and choose stylish eyelashes from the right panel. Want soft glam or bold drama? You decide!
    • If you complete the make up, move on to the next level: hair makeover!
    • Give your client a fresh new hairstyle. You can switch cuts, change colors (even go two-tone like pink and blue), and make them shine!
    • If she looks happy with the end result of her hair, next is NAILS!
  • Pick a lipstick, swipe on colorful blush, and choose stylish eyelashes from the right panel. Want soft glam or bold drama? You decide!
  • If you complete the make up, move on to the next level: hair makeover!
  • Give your client a fresh new hairstyle. You can switch cuts, change colors (even go two-tone like pink and blue), and make them shine!

    • Make the manicure, and apply nail polish. Then add some glitter, french tips of your preferred color or some other nail art options.
    • Finish it off with rings, bracelets or watches to complete the look.
    • Once you've styled all three parts, you’ll see green checkmarks on each portrait, meaning your job is done! Take a screenshot of your makeover and share it with friends! If you want, you can always press the refresh button to go wild with new looks.

    Is Julie Beauty Saloon safe for kids?

    Yes! Julie Beauty Saloon is a kid-friendly makeover game with no violence or inappropriate content. It's perfect game for kids who enjoy fashion and creativity.

    Love Beauty & Makeover Games?

    Check out Princess Beauty Salon for another glow-up adventure. It features royalty-level glam, extra makeup tools, and even dress-up options for those who want to take styling even further.

name: Tunnel Road
description:
Tunnel Road is a 3D avoid game where you navigate in a sci-fi, spinning tunnel full of twists, turns, and sudden obstacles. It's all about surviving as long as you can. The game starts off manageable. But, as the tempo picks up, so does the pressure. If you hit an obstacle, you're back at level 1... unless you choose to use one of your limited revivals. It's a kind of game that pulls you in and doesn't let go.

Since the early days of browser arcades, tunnel games have been around with us. They take inspiration from classic endless runners and even some retro sci-fi games where you fly through wormholes. But Tunnel Road takes that concept and gives it a slick, colorful makeover with smooth controls, randomized levels and competitive 2-player support. So, it is a pure test of your reflexes wrapped up in a brand new package. Smoother than ever before. Let's start our journey in the wormhole!

Controls

1-Player Mode:

  • Move left: Press A or Left Arrow
  • Move right: Press D or Right Arrow
  • Move left: Press A or Left Arrow
  • Move right: Press D or Right Arrow

    • 2-Player Mode:

    • Player 1: A / D
    • Player 2: Left / Right Arrows
  • Player 1: A / D
  • Player 2: Left / Right Arrows

    • How to Play Tunnel Road

    Start by choosing whether you want to play alone or against a friend. Once you're in, your only goal is simple: stay alive. Your ball speeds forward through a swirling tunnel filled with unexpected blockades and gaps. You must steer left or right to dodge everything in your path.

    Each time you complete a run, you progress to a new level, but hit just one obstacle and you're forced to restart from level 1. That is unless you opt to revive with an ad and keep your streak going.

    The real challenge is keeping up with the speed. It increases little by little, pushing your limits. No power-ups, no invincibility, no brakes and definitely no slow motion. It's just you, your reflexes and the tunnel ahead...

    Explore Tunnel Road With a Friend

    Tunnel Road gets even more exciting when you bring in a second player. In 2-player mode, both players race through the same tunnel side by side. The goal is to stay alive longer than your opponent. You and your friend will each control a separate ball on your half of the screen, dodging obstacles in parallel tunnels. If one player crashes, the other player instantly wins the round. To start the game, select 2-Player Mode from the main menu. The screen will split vertically Player 1 plays on the left, Player 2 on the right. Player 1 uses A (left) and D (right). First one to crash loses the round!

    Developer

    Tunnel Road was developed by gamevgames. The game's design blends traditional endless tunnel racing with modern arcade polish. It runs smoothly in your browser.

    Other Skill Games to Play Online

    If Tunnel Road keeps you on the edge of your seat, try Extreme Run 3D next. It's another high-speed "avoid-obstacles" challenge with flashy visuals and faster curves. Both games will test your reflexes, but Extreme Run 3D leans even harder into intensity, speed and variety of dynamic obstacles like spikes and wrecking balls. Great for fans who want to push the limits of their gaming skills.

name: Thief Puzzle
description:
Thief Puzzle is a funny and clever story puzzle game where you play as a sneaky thief with one superpower: a stretchy arm that can reach almost anything! His arm is so elastic that he can even hug the Statue of Liberty. But getting what you want isn't easy. You'll have to sneak past traps, dodge obstacles, and avoid setting off wild chain reactions just to grab your prize, which is sometimes a bag of groceries and sometimes a precious diamond ring.

Every level is like a mini cartoon with stickmen. You'll get funny animations whether you win or fail. Want to yank a treasure chest away from a pirate? Or snatch a suitcase in front of the Eiffel Tower while a tourist takes selfies? This free online game is packed with silly scenarios that will keep you laughing through every challenge.

Controls

  • On PC: Click and drag the thief's arm toward the object
  • On mobile: Touch and drag anywhere on the screen
  • Release to let go when you reach your target
  • On PC: Click and drag the thief's arm toward the object
  • On mobile: Touch and drag anywhere on the screen
  • Release to let go when you reach your target

    • How to Play Thief Puzzle

    Your goal in each level is simple: grab the item. But the way you get there is anything but simple. There are traps, angry characters, fire hydrants, TNT barrels, and all kinds of objects that can ruin your perfect heist. Touch the wrong thing, and it's game over with a funny twist.

    Reveal Funny Stories at Each Level

    What really makes Thief Puzzle stand out is the way each level feels like a little story. You're not just solving puzzles, but you're living through short, animated scenes. And the good news is there are 400 levels with unique stories.

    In one level, you're in Paris trying to grab a suitcase. But there's a fire hydrant, a red balloon, and a tourist in the way. Get it wrong, and you'll fly through the air in cartoon-style chaos.

    Another time, you'll stretch across a pirate ship, sneaking past TNT barrels and a dozing captain just to reach a golden treasure chest.

    Some levels turn into mini detective tales like the museum level, where you have to quietly reach past a statue to swipe a thief's loot without anyone noticing. And you'll blame him for stealing the loots. Lol!

    There's even a scene in a park, where a character is about to propose. The twist? You're stealing the engagement ring from the hopeful romantic!

    Each level gets harder, with crazier setups and more things to watch out for. One moment you're just dodging a dog. The next, you're dealing with lasers, guards, or lovers in a dramatic moment. With 400 levels, the game keeps surprising you with new scenes, jokes, and challenges.

    Failures Are Part of the Fun

    Even when you lose, the game rewards you with a funny scene. It might be a slapstick fall, an explosion, or an awkward interruption that makes you laugh. You'll probably replay some levels just to see what happens when things go wrong.

    Other Funny Games You'll Love

    If you enjoyed the silly situations and fail animations in Thief Puzzle, you should definitely check out Henry Stickmin: Stealing the Diamond. It's another free online game full of wild choices, surprising outcomes, and hilarious story paths. Just like Thief Puzzle, it's all about experimenting, laughing at the results, and finding clever ways to succeed (or fail in style). In both funny games, each level feels like a sketch from a comedy show, where anything can happen and usually does.

    Is Thief Puzzle safe for kids?

    Thief Puzzle is generally safe for kids over the age of 5. It features cartoon-style visuals, silly humor, and no realistic violence or harmful content. The gameplay is light-hearted and focused on solving creative puzzles through trial and error. However, parents should be aware that the main character is a thief, and the goal of each level is to steal objects (sometimes in sneaky or deceptive ways.) While the game presents this in a humorous and exaggerated cartoon manner, it's still important to talk with younger players about the difference between game logic and real-world behavior. Being clever is fun, but stealing isn't right. As long as younger audiences understand this, Thief Puzzle can be a fun and harmless game that encourages problem-solving and creative thinking without showing any violent materials.

    Can I play Thief Puzzle for free?

    Yes! You can play Thief Puzzle online for free at OnlineGames.io. No download or sign-up is needed.

    How many levels does Thief Puzzle have?

    There are 400 levels, each with its own unique setup, story, and puzzle to solve.

    Do I need to be good at puzzles to enjoy it?

    Not at all! Thief Puzzle is made for everyone. Some levels are tricky, but the fun is in experimenting. You'll learn as you play.

    Can I play Thief Puzzle on mobile?

    Yes. You can play it on both desktop and mobile browsers at OnlineGames.io with full touch support.

name: Mini Cars Racing
description:
Mini Cars Racing is a 2 player car racing game you can play free on OnlineGames.io! You can race against the clock or battle a friend on the same device. It's fast, fun, and feels just like playing with toy cars on your childhood road traffic rug.

So, as you load the game, you have two options to choose from: Solo, where you race against CPU cars, or 2 Player (versus), a split-screen local multiplayer mode perfect for racing with a friend on the same keyboard. The controls are tight, the visuals are playful, and the tracks are wild and twisty.

There are two race types to master:

  • Arcade Mode: A classic 3-lap race against opponents. Outdrive them and cross the finish line first.
  • Time Trial Mode: Race solo against the clock and beat your own record. No rivals here.
  • Arcade Mode: A classic 3-lap race against opponents. Outdrive them and cross the finish line first.
  • Time Trial Mode: Race solo against the clock and beat your own record. No rivals here.

    • You can also choose from three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, and Expert. Expert mode will make the steering even more difficult in your mini car.

    Controls

    Player 1

    • Accelerate: W
    • Brake: S
    • Left / Right: A / D
    • Respawn: C
  • Accelerate: W
  • Brake: S
  • Left / Right: A / D
  • Respawn: C

    • Player 2

    • Accelerate: Up Arrow
    • Brake: Down Arrow
    • Left / Right: Left Arrow / Right Arrow
    • Respawn: Keypad 1
  • Accelerate: Up Arrow
  • Brake: Down Arrow
  • Left / Right: Left Arrow / Right Arrow
  • Respawn: Keypad 1

    • How to Play Mini Cars Racing

    • Pick Solo or Versus mode from the main menu.
    • Choose your car among 8 funky mini cars, each with a different color and shape. From mini trucks to sporty vans, find your signature mini car.
    • Select your race mode: Arcade or Time Trial.
    • Choose one of three cool tracks:
      • Bridge Madness: Full of wild jumps and narrow bridges.
      • Cactus County: Desert-themed track with sharp turns.
      • Rock Island: A rocky, cliffside challenge with scenic views and deadly drops.
    • Adjust your difficulty, then hit Start and race your way to the top!
    • Expect obstacles like traffic cones and floating ramps. And don't worry, if you fall off the map, you'll respawn. And if you get stuck in a corner, just hit the respawn key and dive back into the race.
