  • To do that, you must give a name to the room, choose the maximum players, game mode, round time, bot count and map.
  • After entering a room, the battle starts immediately. Take your position and start eliminating enemies.
  • Learn about how to aim and shoot, other controls, display, armory, and maps below.

name: Obby Tower Parkour Climb
description:
Obby Tower Parkour Climb is a parkour game with a cool Roblox vibe. You'll climb up colorful platforms and obstacle courses to reach the top. The game has three maps named Tunnel, Tower and Stairs. The best part of this obby game is you can play alone or race with a friend in split-screen mode. Plus there are two different modes on each map: normal and challenge. Learn about them below.

Editor's Review

I've played a lot of parkour games, and Obby Tower Parkour Climb is a nice one that mixes Roblox elements with climbing challenges. It's fun, especially when you play with a friend. It's not too intense, but it keeps you coming back to beat your last climb.

Controls

Single Player Mode:

  • Move: Use W, A, S, D or the Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Press SPACE
  • Sprint: Hold L-SHIFT
  • Look Around: Move your MOUSE to look, scroll to zoom
  • Move: Use W, A, S, D or the Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Press SPACE
  • Sprint: Hold L-SHIFT
  • Look Around: Move your MOUSE to look, scroll to zoom

    • Two Player Mode:

    • Player 1:
      • Move: W, A, S, D
      • Jump: SPACE
      • Sprint: L-SHIFT
    • Player 2:
      • Move: Arrow Keys
      • Jump: L
      • Sprint: K

    • Move: W, A, S, D
    • Jump: SPACE
    • Sprint: L-SHIFT

    • Jump: SPACE
    • Sprint: L-SHIFT

  • Jump: SPACE

    • Move: Arrow Keys
    • Jump: L

    • How to Play Obby Tower Parkour Climb

    • First, choose if you'd like to go solo or 2 player. In Two Player Mode, you and a friend compete side by side. Each player uses different controls. The first one to reach the top wins. It's a fun way to see who can master the tower faster.
    • Next, choose a map to start: Tunnel, Tower and Stairs maps are available with increasing difficulty. We suggest you start with Tunnel if you're new to Obby games.
    • Your goal is to climb to the top of the tower. Use the controls above to move, jump, and sprint.
    • Look around by moving your mouse to plan your next moves. There's no time limit, so focus on understanding the layout and mastering your moves.
    • You can check how far you climbed on the progress bar in the top left corner of your screen.
    • If you choose the challenge mode, this adds a timer to your climb. You need to reach the top as fast as possible. Practice the routes in Normal Mode to find the quickest way up. This mode is great for testing how fast you can complete the climb without any mistakes.

name: Motor Tour
description:
Let's rev up your engines and zoom into motorbike races! Motor Tour is a free premium browser game that lets you hop on powerful motorbikes and race through traffic, endless highways, and fierce one-on-one showdowns. If you love traffic games, electrifying near misses, and tons of upgrades, then this one is for you. Feel the rush as you weave through roads, collect cash, nitrous or XP points on the road and leave your rivals in the dust. If you are a speed demon, start playing Motor Tour and immerse yourself in this epic experience!

Roll out your ride, rev that engine, and show off your mad skills in Motor Tour. It’s time to play this game online, take on races, and leave ordinary driving sims in the dust. Hit the road now, and get ready for the ride of your life!

Other Bike Games

If you enjoy Motor Tour, you might also like other highway traffic games online on our site. One of the most popular bike traffic games is Highway Moto. It really stands out with endless racing modes, cool bikes, premium 3d graphics and tight controls. Keep an eye on OnlineGames.io for more exciting titles to test your driving and reflexes!

Controls

  • W: Move Forward
  • A: Turn Left
  • D: Turn Right
  • S: Brake
  • Left Shift: Nitro Boost
  • ESC: Go Back/Pause
  • W: Move Forward
  • A: Turn Left
  • D: Turn Right
  • S: Brake
  • Left Shift: Nitro Boost
  • ESC: Go Back/Pause

    • How to Play Motor Tour

    You can start by selecting your favorite game mode: Career, Special Event, Endless, or Race. For beginners, it’s a good idea to practice in endless mode first. You’ll cruise down a busy highway until you crash, so it’s perfect to get a feel for the bike’s handling.

    Or you can try career mode where you’ll tackle different missions under time pressure. It starts with relatively easy missions and the difficulty ramps up slowly. You can prove you can handle tight turns and avoid reckless drivers while collecting enough cash to unlock more upgrades. In Race mode, challenge tough AI opponents in an intense head-to-head showdown, collect nitrous on the road to gain an edge over your rival. Want something different? Special Event mode offers fun tasks and big loot rewards.

    Game Features

    • 40 Motorbikes: With 40 different bikes in the garage, you won’t run out of choices. Each one has its own style, and you can show your personality by customizing your license plate. Represent your country with its flag, and write a cool message on the plate.
    • Deep Upgrades: Boost power, turbo, brakes, acceleration, handling, and nitro. Each upgrade helps you handle your bike better and improve overall performance. The best way to dominate the road is to keep enhancing those stats.
    • Multiple Game Modes: Pick from four main modes: Career, Special Event, Endless, or Race. Each one offers a new challenge, whether you love timed missions, intense races, or endless cruising.
    • Premium 3D Graphics: The game sports impressive visuals that make every ride feel realistic. From the shine on your motorbike to the detailed cityscape, you’ll be drawn into the action.
    • Online Rewards: Motor Tour lets you watch ads to earn quick cash, gold, or blueprints. It might be worth it if you’re in a hurry to get that new upgrade or unlock a new bike!

name: Five Nights At Freddys
description:
Freddy Fazbear's Pizza restaurant opens its doors to the customers! They needed a night watchman and you got the job. Five Nights at Freddy's (FNAF) is a 2D action game where you work as the security guard of this legendary restaurant.

You must be on duty for five consecutive nights from midnight to 6 am. However, you need to be careful! The animatronics are wandering around the lobbies in this survival game!

Controls

Desktops and Laptops

  • Mouse: Look Around
  • Left-Click: Interact with Lights and Doors
  • Hover the Mouse Over (at the bottom of the screen): Open the Camera Panel
  • Mouse: Look Around
  • Left-Click: Interact with Lights and Doors
  • Hover the Mouse Over (at the bottom of the screen): Open the Camera Panel

    • Mobile Devices

    • Use the touchscreen to play the game.
  • Use the touchscreen to play the game.

    • About FNAF

    WARNING!

    This horror game contains flashing lights, loud noises and lots of jumpscares!

    The legendary restaurant has opened and will start serving. They need a security guard who will work between 12 am and 6 am. And now you got that job. You will be responsible for the safety of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza restaurant.

    But this won't be easy. Because when night comes, animatronic characters will start wandering in the lobbies. Watch them on camera, and close the doors when they approach. Don't let the sounds startle you.

    Monitor Animatronics

    • There are four animatronics in this horror game. Their names are Freddy Fazbear, Bonnie, Chica and Foxy.
    • They will wander around the restaurant at night. You must avoid getting in touch with them as they can easily jumpscare you.
    • If you jumpscare, you will restart from the beginning. Ensure that they can't reach you!
    • To survive, you must monitor the security cameras from the camera panel. There are eleven cameras to check.
    • And you need to keep checking them one by one frequently until your watch is over. Turn off the doors and lights when they approach you!
  • There are four animatronics in this horror game. Their names are Freddy Fazbear, Bonnie, Chica and Foxy.
  • They will wander around the restaurant at night. You must avoid getting in touch with them as they can easily jumpscare you.
  • If you jumpscare, you will restart from the beginning. Ensure that they can't reach you!
  • To survive, you must monitor the security cameras from the camera panel. There are eleven cameras to check.
  • And you need to keep checking them one by one frequently until your watch is over. Turn off the doors and lights when they approach you!

    • Use the Power Properly

    To guard yourself from the animatronics, you need to keep the doors shut. You will also need to use lights from time to time. But they work with power. If the battery reaches zero it will not be possible to use them.

    Just a reminder to use the power responsibly in the restaurant. Only use it when needed to save energy. You can keep an eye on the battery level in the lower left corner of the screen.

When you are done with the scribbling, it's your turn to guess. Be as quick as possible in both drawing and guessing; then, you will gain more points.

How to Play Skribblio?

  • At first, pick a username and enter a room. 
  • You will see a number of players in the room.
  • When it's your turn, you will draw the given word. If not, try to guess the word.

    • Choose a word that you can draw well.
    • You have 80 seconds to draw the word.
    • You will see the toolbox at the bottom.
    • Choose the color and size of the pen.
    • Start drawing your word and let them guess as soon as possible.
    • Using different colors beautifies your drawings and increases your chances.
    • If you misdraw something, you can undo or clear the board.
    • To erase a part of the drawing, use the swap.

    • How many players are there in Skribblio?

    A minimum of 2 and a maximum of 20 players can participate in a Skribblio room. You may notice some players leave or enter while the game continues. 

    Can you use a tablet pen with Skribblio?

    Yes, you can use a tablet pen with Skribblio. In order to do that, connect your drawing tablet to your computer. Arrange your settings so that you can move your cursor by dragging your tablet pen. Then, you are ready to show off your drawing skills in Skribblio.

    How do I change the line size and colors in Skribblio?

    The toolbox is at the bottom of the screen. Its functions include showing your pen's color and size, as well as an eraser and an undo button for when you misdraw.

    Which languages are available in Skribblio?

    Skribblio is most commonly played in English. However, you can play Skribblio in 28 languages, including German, French, Italian, and Japanese. Choose your language before entering a room. If you select a less-spoken language, you may need to wait for other players to join the game for a while. If you want to play it immediately, invite your friends to play together.

    Can you spectate in Skribblio?

    Unfortunately, you can't. There is no spectator mode in Skribblio yet. If you are too shy to participate or draw in a Skribblio room, don't worry. Your turn will only take 80 seconds. It will get much easier and more fun when you play along. Give yourself a couple of rounds to get used to it.

    How do I kick someone out in Skribblio?

    At Skribblio, there is a democratic atmosphere. If you did not like a player's behavior in the game, you may vote to kick them by clicking on the pax. If the majority votes for kicking that player, he is out of the room.

    If you have created the room, you can kick anyone without voting.

    Which game is Skribblio inspired by?

    Skribblio is inspired by the famous board game Pictionary. Some consider Skribblio as an online version of Pictionary.

name: Vex X3M 2
description:
Vex X3M 2 is where the slick parkour madness of the original Vex meets the extreme bike stunts of Moto X3M. If you thought dodging spikes and leaping over saws was intense on foot, wait until you try it on two wheels! This parkour racing game takes the familiar Vex vibe, tight controls, and tricky traps such as spikes, explosives, guns and rolling platforms and throws in a turbocharged motorcycle. With new mechanics like kite gliding and teleportation portals, each level becomes a wild ride filled with action.

You'll race through obstacle-packed tracks, soar across massive gaps, and flip your way through moving traps. Be warned! This game requires lots of gaming skills. But it's also rewarding if you dare to speed. So don't be afraid to take risks! Just be ready for the unexpected because platforms fall, walls move, and one wrong move could send you back to the last checkpoint flag.

Controls

  • Accelerate: W or Up Arrow
  • Tilt Left/Right:  A / D or Left and right arrow keys
  • Brake/Reverse: S or Down Arrow
  • Accelerate: W or Up Arrow
  • Tilt Left/Right:  A / D or Left and right arrow keys
  • Brake/Reverse: S or Down Arrow

    • How to Play Vex X3M 2

    • Start by choosing a level track from the map. There are 30 tracks with increasing difficulty.
    • Use your bike to ride through each level as fast as you can.
    • Watch out for deadly traps like spikes, saws, swinging axes, and crumbling platforms.
    • Use new tools like kite gliders to fly over gaps and teleporters (green zones) to zap across dangerous areas.
    • Complete the level to earn up to 3 stars based on your time.
    • Toggle the hard mode on the top right of the level select menu to replay levels with an extra challenge and more stars.
    • Unlock custom bike skins with the stars you collect!
  • Start by choosing a level track from the map. There are 30 tracks with increasing difficulty.
  • Use your bike to ride through each level as fast as you can.
  • Watch out for deadly traps like spikes, saws, swinging axes, and crumbling platforms.
  • Use new tools like kite gliders to fly over gaps and teleporters (green zones) to zap across dangerous areas.
  • Complete the level to earn up to 3 stars based on your time.
  • Toggle the hard mode on the top right of the level select menu to replay levels with an extra challenge and more stars.
  • Unlock custom bike skins with the stars you collect!

    • Tips & Tricks for Parkour Games

    In parkour games like Vex X3M 2, it's usually a bad idea to speed through a level on your first try. Trust me, you probably won't be able to make it to the end at the first trial in this kind of skill games. So, take a moment to study the traps and obstacles; you'll save yourself a lot of restarts. If the game gives you special movement tools like gliders or teleporters like this one, spend some time getting used to how they work. They can really help, but they're not always easy to control at first.

    Pay attention to the rhythm of moving traps just like you did in Geometry Dash. Most of them follow predictable patterns because the obstacles and timing are usually fine-tuned by game designers. So once you get the timing down, dodging becomes much easier. And if you crash? Don't sweat it. Quickly restart from your last checkpoint and try again. The faster you finish, the better your score or star rating will be.

    Also, don't ignore unlockable items like skins. They might seem cosmetic, but in a lot of these games, unlocking new gear is a sign that you've really mastered the course. It's a fun way to show off your progress.

    Developer

    Azerion Casual Games created Vex X3M 2, bringing together the best of both worlds in a fan-favorite hybrid. It's perfect for players who love action platformers and stunt challenges.

    More Online Stunt Games to Try

    Love flipping over danger and racing against the clock? Check these out next: Moto X3M Online is a classic bike stunt action game with beachy explosions and sharp curves. Or try Vex 7, the latest parkour challenge through lasers, traps, and sneaky surprises. All games are online, free to play, and smooth in your browser! So dive in!

name: Hoop World 3D
description:
Get ready to flip, jump, and dunk your way through wild levels in Hoop World 3D! This 3D basketball game isn’t your average dunk contest, it’s a high-flying, time-your-jump-right kind of ride with trampolines, wormholes, and some seriously wacky physics. You'll bounce across floating platforms like a legendary NBA player, fly through space portals, and try to land the perfect slam dunk... all while doing as many flips as possible. The more flips you pull off, the more coins you earn, and the cooler you look when you finally dunk it.

Every level brings a new challenge. Some jumps are short and sweet, others launch you through entire worlds. Mess up your timing, and you’ll go crashing into the ground (with some pretty funny falls, honestly). But stick the landing, and you’ll feel like a hero. In case you'd like to keep on dunking after playing Hoop World 3D, you can try Basketball io for free on OnlineGames.io!

Controls

Computers:

  • Hold left click or spacebar to flip in the air
  • Release to attempt a dunk
  • Hold left click or spacebar to flip in the air
  • Release to attempt a dunk

    • Mobile Devices:

    • Tap and hold anywhere on the screen to flip
    • Release your finger to dunk
  • Tap and hold anywhere on the screen to flip
  • Release your finger to dunk

    • How to Play Hoop World 3D

    • Start a level, hold left click to launch yourself into the air.
    • Hold to keep flipping, every extra spin earns you more coins.
    • If there's a wormholes, try to enter it during flight. They’ll teleport you into new scenes for even bigger jumps.
    • When you're near the hoop, release mouse click go just in time to slam dunk into the basket.
    • Earn coins, move to the next level, and get ready to fly again.
    • Every level gets a bit trickier, with longer gaps, requiring more spins, and tricky hoops.
    • Save your coins to unlock cooler NBA players in the shop. Or perhaps you'd like to jump and dunk as Hulk, Superman or Spiderman?
  • Start a level, hold left click to launch yourself into the air.
  • Hold to keep flipping, every extra spin earns you more coins.
  • If there's a wormholes, try to enter it during flight. They’ll teleport you into new scenes for even bigger jumps.
  • When you're near the hoop, release mouse click go just in time to slam dunk into the basket.
  • Earn coins, move to the next level, and get ready to fly again.
  • Every level gets a bit trickier, with longer gaps, requiring more spins, and tricky hoops.
  • Save your coins to unlock cooler NBA players in the shop. Or perhaps you'd like to jump and dunk as Hulk, Superman or Spiderman?

    • Developer

    Hoop World 3D was developed by TapNation. If you'd like to play another sports game by them, you can play Golf Orbit for free on OnlineGames.io

    Editor’s Review

    At first, I honestly thought Hoop World 3D was just one of those games where the flips happen on their own and you just kinda watch. I didn’t expect to have much control. But nope, I was totally wrong. The timing actually matters a lot, and if you mess it up, your player just faceplants in the funniest way possible. It took me a few tries to figure out the rhythm, but once I did, it got super fun and kind of addicting. I caught myself saying, “Okay, last level,” like five times in a row.

    The wormholes that launch you into different places mid-air are such a cool touch, and unlocking characters like Hulk or Spiderman makes it even better. It’s got that perfect mix of silly physics and satisfying challenge. And believe me, this one has over the top graphics compared to average stickman ragdoll games. So yes, this game’s a great way to kill time in the best way. Definitely one of those browser games you come back to. So… ready to flip, fly, and dunk like a pro?

    Technical Info

    Game Provider: TapNation
    Languages: English
    Release Date:  2024 (Web-GL), 2021 (iOS & Android) 
    Genre: Sports, Arcade
    Mode: Singleplayer
    Platforms: Web browser (desktop and mobile), Android, iOS
    Controls: Mouse
    Save: Saved in browser cache

name: Basket Random
description:
Basket Random is a pixelated arcade game where you participate in basketball games online against the CPU or a friend. The basketball players have limited mobility. Direct your character with only one key and perform the most dunks to the hoops to win. Basket Random will give you great pleasure with changing characters and environments as one of the most favorable sports games!

How to Play Basket Random

  • There will be two teams in a match, and each team will have two members.
  • Controlling the player will be the utmost challenge, as you can only use one key to control the stickman.
  • You can not easily guess which way the character will move. But once you learn to control your man, no one can beat you anymore!
  • When you get the ball, try to dunk it directly to the opposite side's hoop without losing it.
  • The one who gets the five scores wins the game.
  • There will be two teams in a match, and each team will have two members.
  • Controlling the player will be the utmost challenge, as you can only use one key to control the stickman.
  • You can not easily guess which way the character will move. But once you learn to control your man, no one can beat you anymore!
  • When you get the ball, try to dunk it directly to the opposite side's hoop without losing it.
  • The one who gets the five scores wins the game.

    • The Dunker or The Defender

    Each team consists of two players: a dunker and a defender. With each of your moves, you actually move both players. To shoot baskets, use the dunker player, as he will be closer to the rival's hoop. He can also easily grab the ball from the opponents.

    The defender is responsible for guarding the hoop. He is behind the dunker. He must prevent opponents from scoring a goal.

    Game Modes in Basket Random

    The game offers you two game modes: 1 Player and 2 Player.

    1P mode will create a match against the computer. Don't underestimate the CPU, as it will test your basketball skills extremely.

    On the other hand, if you want to challenge yourself with a friend, you can play in the 2P mode. It's always fun to play with a buddy. Make your selections from the menu according to your desires.

    Changing Environments and Physics

    Each time you or your opponent scores a basket, the players' uniform and playing field will change. You will engage in matches with different themes, such as a snowy scene or a sandy beach. The players will wear suits or basic basketball uniforms from time to time. Even the ball will have different shapes.

    For example, the iron ball will make it harder for you to make precise dunks. In contrast, the light ball can get out of control quickly. Players' arms and hoops can randomly lengthen or shorten, as well.

    Controls

    • Player 1: W Key
    • Player 2: Upper Arrow Key
  • Player 1: W Key
  • Player 2: Upper Arrow Key

    • Developer

    Basket Random was developed by RHM Interactive.

    What is More?

    If you enjoy playing Basket Random, you may also try Basketball Slam Dunk. The players' arms will fly in the air in the game. Control the arms before they intertwine, and try to score as many as possible!

    For further options, you may look for other basketball games for free on OnlineGames.io. Keep coming back to explore new and thrilling games. Making new discoveries with free browser games at Online Games is very easy.

name: Gulper io
description:
Gulper io is a multiplayer snake game where your aim is to collect Tron light cycles to get bigger in size. But you must avoid getting into contact with any other snakes or walls. Otherwise, you will have to start from scratch. Dominate the playground by being the biggest gulper among others, and write your name on the leaderboard in one of the most challenging io games!

How to Play Gulper io

Gulpers are deep-sea eels that have enormous jaws. You will take the place of one of them in this arcade game! Terrifying, right? There are many other gulpers on the playing field. Like you, they will also try to take the light cycles and grow in size to rule the sea. Any contact with them or walls will cause you to start as a little gulper again. Avoid them as much as possible, especially the larger ones. You can easily escape from the little ones, but the bigger gulpers are real threats.

Change Your Gulper’s Color

Before joining the game, give your gulper a nickname and determine its color from the slider in the lower right corner of the screen. When you scroll by holding down the left mouse button, you will see the color change. Choose your favorite color for the gulper, and then you will be ready to engage in snake wars! It will be a very colorful war for the eyes.

Accelerate the Gulper

You can speed up your snake by clicking the left mouse button or the spacebar. The accelerated speed can help you dodge other players in the quickest way possible when you encounter one of them. In addition, you can easily take up many light cycles in a shorter period by accelerating. When a snake is eliminated, it will drop all its eaten pellets. To collect them quickly before others do, use this speed-up to your benefit!

Trap Your Adversaries

Move forward strategically! As you get bigger and longer in size, you can use these against your opponents. You can easily trap them by drawing circles around them. It will block them from slipping away through your snake’s body. Move in a way that leaves others no escape route. Remember that if there are two giant snakes on the playing field, this means limited movement space for the little gulpers and the big ones.

Rooms in Gulper io

You have the option to join one of the available rooms. Or you can create one. After entering your nickname into the input field, add the @ sign and enter the name of the game room. If enough players join the room, it can be successfully created when the same name is entered in the input field during a certain time. These kinds of rooms are called private rooms. Public rooms are accessible to every player just by entering a nickname.

Controls

  • Mouse: Move
  • Left-Click or Spacebar: Accelerate
  • Touchscreen: for Mobile Devices
  • Mouse: Move
  • Left-Click or Spacebar: Accelerate
  • Touchscreen: for Mobile Devices

    • Developer

    Gulper io was developed by tonsomar.

    Similar Browser Games

    If you are a Gulper io fan, you may also like playing Agar.io. You will embody a cell and move forward on the map in the game. Eat the blobs and get bigger and bigger. But keep in mind that as you grow, you will lose your speed!

    For further options, you may look up other free io games on OnlineGames.io. If you stay tuned, you will always find new and thrilling games. Online Games offers diversity for its players by bringing online games in many categories.

name: Capybara Clicker Pro
description:
Capybara Clicker Pro is an idle clicker game in which you tap on the adorable Capybara to collect Capybara coins. Increase the number of coins you make by clicking on the cute animal every second and every click to achieve more significant figures! The goal of this game is to tap and earn coins. As you progress, you'll also be able to unlock new great characters!

How to Play Capybara Clicker Pro

The gameplay is simple. Tap on the Capybara to get coins. You can increase your earnings per second or click by purchasing the boosters on the right. As you earn more coins, you will be able to unlock more characters. You can see these wonderful characters by hitting the t-shirt icon at the top of the game screen.

Boosters in Capybara

On the right side of the screen, you'll notice boosters stacked one on top of the other. You must invest your Capybara coins here in order for the game to advance. These boosts will significantly assist you in raising your revenue.

  • Earn +100 capybaras per click with the Professional Clicker!
  • Make +200 capybaras every second using the Robot.
  • Glitch Clicker booster gives you an extra +1000 capybaras for every click you make.
  • The Factory booster will add +5000 capybaras to your idle coins every second.
  • Earn +100 capybaras per click with the Professional Clicker!
  • Make +200 capybaras every second using the Robot.
  • Glitch Clicker booster gives you an extra +1000 capybaras for every click you make.
  • The Factory booster will add +5000 capybaras to your idle coins every second.

    • Cute Capybara Characters

    As you go through the game, you will unlock new Capybara characters. They're all sweeter than the last! These lovely critters can be found by clicking on the t-shirt icon. You can find the following characters here.

    • Capycorn
    • Kapybaru
    • Capybored
    • Camobara
    • Cosmic Capybara
  • Capycorn

    • Weather Conditions

    Did you know that you can change the weather conditions of the Capybara? You can see the weather conditions you can unlock by clicking the cloud icon at the top of the screen. It is possible to see rainy, snowy, sunny and even starry weather here!

    The Pink Bar

    When you earn many coins by clicking on the Capybara repeatedly, a pink bar appears in the lower left corner. When you fill this bar completely, you earn twice the coins you would normally earn.

    Controls

    • Tap on the Capybara to earn coins.
  • Tap on the Capybara to earn coins.

    If you like Capybara Clicker Pro, you might also like Cookie Tap, in which you manufacture your own cookies with the help of Cookie Grandma. You can also seek up more idle games on OnlineGames.io to get additional game options. If you stay connected, you will constantly find new, exciting idle games!

name: Real Flight Simulator
description:
Real Flight Simulator is a realistic game that gives you the ultimate flight experience.
There is the possibility to choose the aircraft you want and start to control the plane.
You will become an expert in controlling the planes, reaching the heights and exploring skies.

You will be able to test the following aircrafts:
• A-10
• A-29
• F-35
• KC-10 
• M-262

Follow the instructions to make the aircraft fly:
1. Turn on the aircraft lights (Press Z) - optional, may cause lag issues
2. Lower flaps and slats if available (Press X)
3. Start-up the engines and wait for the startup sequence to complete (Press C)
4. Throttle up the engines (Press and hold R or V to increase engine power)
5. Release parking brakes (Press B)
6. Rotate once takeoff speed is reached - above 150 knots (Press Down arrow)
7. Raise landing gear above 100ft (Press M)
8. Continue with normal flight...

Real Flight Simulator controls:
AD to roll
WS to pitch
QE to yaw 
RF for Engine Throttle (Power)
1 to change weapon
2 to lock target
Space to fire
Escape or F2 to main menu
H to hide controls info

name: TB World
description:
In TB World, your creativity has no limits! This free online kids game takes the core fun of Toca Boca World and gives you instant access to every item and feature. ALL ARE UNLOCKED! No more waiting for special unlocks or in-game currency. Instead, you dive right in and and start decorating the Toca Boca World with any item on the store. You set the rules here. Not your level, not in-app purchases. So, if you love making up stories, decorating houses, and customizing unique Toca Boca characters, then TB World is the game for you. It's like playing house on your tablet with an infinite amount of dolls and toy furniture.  

The best part is the game is mobile compatible, so it doesn't matter if you're on a computer or a tablet, you can play this browser game. Start designing your dream scenarios anytime. Prepare to create your own imaginative world and share it with friends!

Ready to begin your big adventure? Hop onto OnlineGames.io and start playing TB World right in your browser. Design houses, dress up your characters, and let your creativity shine in this free game online. Try it now and see what fun stories you can create!

Controls

Computer: Use your mouse to drag and drop objects around the screen.

Mobile: Tap and hold to pick something up, then release to place it.

How to Play TB World

  • In TB World, you can be the director of your very own universe. It's like playing Sims 2D with the cutest visuals ever.
  • Start by picking or creating characters. Give them silly hairstyles or funky outfits. Customize the look with eye, nose and eyebrow shapes. Give them a nice smile and move on to the next character. You can save up to 10 Toca Bocas in your slots.
  • Next, choose a cozy place on the map for them to live. You can decorate a small apartment or even a spacious beachside home. It's all up to you. After dragging your characters inside, add furniture, paintings, and other fun items to spice up the rooms.
  • Remember, everything is unlocked, so you don't have to grind or level-up for anything. Want to celebrate your new home? Throw a virtual party at the park!
  • To customize your story even more, click on the emoji icon on the bottom left. Choose an expression and drag it onto a character. Make them talk, express themselves, laugh, or get mad!
  • You can snap in-game photos or come up with little adventures. The only limit here is your imagination. Have fun!

    • Game Features

    • Character Creator: One of the best things about TB World is the powerful character creator. You can pick hairstyles, change outfits, and choose eye shapes. It's a total playground for anyone who likes designing their own avatars.
    • Unlimited Furniture: Ever dream of having giant bean bags or a fancy kitchen? You'll find everything you need to fill your virtual home. You can even mix and match styles to make your house truly one-of-a-kind.
    • Multiple Homes: Multiple houses are available on the map! Experiment with different looks and themes. Turn one home into a bohemian paradise and another into a futuristic pad.
    • Emotions and Expressions: Your characters can show how they feel, whether that's joy, surprise, or even a little grumpiness. This makes your story scenes come to life.
    • Ready-Made Characters: If you'd rather skip customizing from scratch, you can use pre-made characters. They're all set to jump into your world.

    • Tips & Tricks for Toca Boca World

    • Sometimes, putting together items that don't look like they match can lead to unexpected and awesome room designs. Don't be afraid to experiment!
    • Invite multiple characters to a house at once and give them their own roles—like a chef, a guest, or a musician. It's a fun way to make the game feel more alive.
    • Use the in-game photo booth feature for quick snapshots. You can document your creations and even share them with your friends.
    • Make your characters react to events. Got a kitchen fire (pretend, of course)? Show them freaking out or calling for help. It's a small touch that goes a long way in storytelling.
    • You might find hidden items or unique decorations that aren't obvious at first glance. Take your time to look around! You can even get pets!

Toca Boca's games are known for their creative flair and child-friendly designs. This is a special fan-made version, where everything is unlocked from the start, letting you test out all sorts of possibilities.

    Other Kids Games

    If you enjoy TB World, you might also like PopTropica. It's another great kids game online where you can create characters and go for platformer, puzzle adventures. As Poptropica has great dialogues and a storyline, it is perfect for learning or improving English skills as well!

name: Stickman Parkour
description:
Stickman Parkour is an online platformer game that you can play on your browser, embracing the easy-to-learn but hard-to-master mechanics. Collect keys, open chests, pass levels and help him find his way out across 30 levels.

What is Stickman Parkour about?

Imagine Stickman, a tiny stick figure who decides one day to go on this epic adventure. He's on a mission to find these super special golden keys. These keys aren't just for opening doors; they unlock these ancient, mysterious gates that might be hiding treasures as cool as a room full of candy! Stickman doesn't have to worry about school or chores, so he's all in for this adventure.

His journey is full of crazy challenges like dodging sharp spikes, swinging on ropes like a monkey, and even swimming like he's in a stick figure Olympics. Each key he finds opens a new gate, leading to more challenges. The big dream? To find the very last gate with the final golden key in his pocket!

Controls

For Computers:

  • Move: Left/Right Arrows or A/D
  • Jump: Up Arrow/W
  • Slide/Dive: Down Arrow/S
  • Move: Left/Right Arrows or A/D
  • Jump: Up Arrow/W
  • Slide/Dive: Down Arrow/S

    • For Mobiles:

    • Use on-screen buttons to control Stickman
  • Use on-screen buttons to control Stickman

    • How to Play Stickman Parkour

    • Use your keyboard or the buttons on the screen to make Stickman jump over dangers, swing on ropes, and swim through water. It's like playing a superhero in a stick-figure world!
    • Your job is to help Stickman grab these golden keys. They're like the ultimate treasure map pieces!
    • Get Stickman to the end of each level, which is marked by a funny squiggle.
  • Use your keyboard or the buttons on the screen to make Stickman jump over dangers, swing on ropes, and swim through water. It's like playing a superhero in a stick-figure world!
  • Your job is to help Stickman grab these golden keys. They're like the ultimate treasure map pieces!
  • Get Stickman to the end of each level, which is marked by a funny squiggle.

    • Developer

    Stickman Parkour game was created by FreezeNova Games Studio.

    Explore More Adventures

    If you're all about Stickman's high-flying escapades, you'll definitely want to try Fancy Pants. In this side-scrolling game, you control a stick figure with an epic hairdo and even fancier pants, running through worlds that are as wild as Stickman's obstacle course but with its own unique twist of humor and style. It's like if Stickman decided to get a wardrobe upgrade and a new set of challenges.

name: Escape Car
description:
Do you remember the very first Grand Theft Auto? That old-school, top-down chaos. Think of that and give it a fresh coat of chunky 3D graphics. Next, drop that straight in your browser. Yes, it's Escape Car, a free online GTA game where you bolt through a mini-city, dodge police cars, tanks, helicopters and scoop up stacks of cash. Every tight drift, every split-second fake-out, and every totaled police cruiser bumps your score higher. Hang on long enough, and you’ll leave with pockets full of upgrade money and a grin wider than the avenue.

Controls

  • A or Left Arrow to steer left
  • D or Right Arrow to steer right.
  • A or Left Arrow to steer left
  • D or Right Arrow to steer right.

    • How to Play Escape Car

    • The moment you touch A or D, the police chase begins.
    • Drive as long as you possibly can without letting the cops box you in. Grab the cash piles on the road for extra money.
    • The BUSTED bar at the top fills with every bump; solid red means game over.
    • The longer you survive, the faster the score counter on the top left ticks.
    • Watch the stars next to your score; each new star means tougher cops and bigger points. First more cars show up, then heavy trucks, and later even tanks and helicopters.
    • When you finally bite the curb, your score instantly converts to money for upgrades. Unlock a new faster car from the garage and repeat. Hit restart and see if that next run tops your record.

  • Drive as long as you possibly can without letting the cops box you in. Grab the cash piles on the road for extra money.

  • The longer you survive, the faster the score counter on the top left ticks.
  • Watch the stars next to your score; each new star means tougher cops and bigger points. First more cars show up, then heavy trucks, and later even tanks and helicopters.
  • When you finally bite the curb, your score instantly converts to money for upgrades. Unlock a new faster car from the garage and repeat. Hit restart and see if that next run tops your record.

    • Unlock Cool Cars

    Money burning a hole in your pocket? Slide over to the Garage and spend it on a random mystery car. You might pull:

    • a tuner that slides around corners like butter,
    • a muscle car that turns cruisers into scrap, or
    • a sports coupe perfect for weaving through traffic.
  • a tuner that slides around corners like butter,
  • a muscle car that turns cruisers into scrap, or
  • a sports coupe perfect for weaving through traffic.

    • Collect them all and build the dream garage you brag about in the comments. No two runs feel the same once you start swapping rides.

    Developer

    Escape Car comes from FreezeNova Games, the studio behind one of the most popular games on OnlineGames.io: Police Chase Drifter. Think of Escape Car as its bigger, shinier 3D cousin, with the same tense pursuits, way more polish.  Ready to floor it? Click Play and prove you can outrun the law and maybe unlock that perfect supercar while you’re at it.

name: Smash Karts
description:
Imagine a 3D multiplayer go-kart bonanza where the track isn't just for racing, but for full-on vehicular mayhem! Welcome to Smash Karts, where elegance meets anarchy, and every turn could lead to either a victory parade or a spectacular kart-smashing spectacle.

Smash Karts is a online driving battle game, as you hit the start button, you're zooming through a kaleidoscope of maps, from candyland nightmares to neon-lit cityscapes. But it's not just about who crosses the finish line first; it's about who remains un-smashed! You'll encounter a barrage of weaponry from your fellow kart jockeys—guns, missiles, mines, and yes, even nukes. Your mission? Stay alive, smash others, and rack up those sweet, sweet XP points. Just keep an eye out for those gift boxes; they're your lifeline for arming up with random weapons.

Controls

  • Up Arrow or W: Gas
  • Down Arrow or S: Brake
  • Left Arrow or A: Steer Left
  • Right Arrow or D: Steer Right
  • Space: Fire
  • Up Arrow or W: Gas
  • Down Arrow or S: Brake
  • Left Arrow or A: Steer Left
  • Right Arrow or D: Steer Right
  • Space: Fire

    • How to Play Smash Karts

    • Head over to OnlineGames.io, find Smash Karts, and dive in by clicking that big, shiny "Play" button.
    • Use your arrow keys or WASD to steer, but remember, in this game, driving straight might be the quickest way to your kart's funeral.
    • Collect those question-marked boxes for a surprise weapon. You only carry one at a time, so choose your moments wisely. Got a mine? Drop it where the traffic's thickest. Gun or nuke? Aim true and obliterate the competition.
    • Each box you drive through is like a Christmas present from a slightly unhinged Santa. Mines, nukes, guns—oh my! Use them to climb that leaderboard.
    • If you're the last kart standing, you win! It's like musical chairs, but with more explosions.
    • Earn coins and gems to deck out your kart with the craziest skins and characters. Fancy a clown driving a disco ball kart? Here's your chance.

    • Game Modes Explained

    There are three game modes you can choose in custom multiplayer rooms. Apart from modes you can enable teams, set round duration between 3 to 20 mins, customize weapons and more. 

    • Free For All (FFA): It's every kart for themselves! Collect weapons from those mysterious boxes and use them to smash opponents. The player with the most kills at the end of the round wins. It's pure, unadulterated kart chaos.
    • Gem Collector: Scattered around the arena are gems. Your mission is to collect more gems than your rivals before time runs out. Think of it like a treasure hunt, but with a lot more explosions.
    • Hat Holder: One hat to rule them all! Find and hold onto the hat for as long as you can while everyone else tries to take it from you. You can't use weapons while carrying the hat, so it's all about evasion and cunning.

name: Drift Hunters Pro
description:
Can you hear the engine moaning? Drift Hunters Pro is a thrilling 3D game with high-quality graphics for those who are fond of drifting & racing. You can play solely, or you can play on the servers with other players. In this game, you have 6 different tracks and 10 upgradable vehicles in the garage that you can buy with earnings via drifting. Enjoy the tire track!

How to Play Drift Hunters Pro?

  • Use WASD or the Arrow keys to direct the vehicle
  • Use the Space key as the handbrake
  • Use C to change the camera view
  • Use R for resetting the vehicle
  • Use U to change KMH > MPH
  • Use I for starting or stopping the engine
  • Use P for Full Screen

Paint them aesthetically, upgrade the cars, adjust the tunings, choose your wheels. Head over to our blog post to learn how to choose a car for drifting.

    Upgrading the Vehicles

name: Five Nights at Poppy
description:
Ever stayed late at school or walked through a dark hallway alone and felt like something was watching you? Did you just hear the footsteps? Is it the wind or someone whistling? Now imagine that same creep, but at an abandoned mental hospital where animatronic Poppy from FNAF stays in. That's exactly where Five Nights at Poppy throws you.

This creepy online horror game puts you in the shoes of a night shift security guard just as in first three FNAF games. But you're not watching out the Freddy's Pizzeria this time. Instead, you're patrolling the mental hospital Poppy is kept. She is angrier than ever. She's got wide glowing eyes, an eerie smile, and definitely she's not here to play.

With the lights flickering and cameras going out, your job is to survive five long nights from 12:00 AM to 6:00 AM. It starts out quiet. Maybe even boring. But by the time the static hits your screens and Poppy's shadow shows up at your door, it's a whole different game. Do whatever you can before you get jumpscared!

Content Warning

Five Nights at Poppy contains intense horror themes, including sudden jump scares, flashing lights, unsettling imagery, and disturbing audio effects. This game is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for younger players or individuals sensitive to frightening content. Viewer discretion is advised. Parental guidance is recommended for children.

Controls

  • Left Click: Interact with lights, doors, and cameras
  • Click and Hold: Repair damaged camera feeds
  • Left Click: Interact with lights, doors, and cameras
  • Click and Hold: Repair damaged camera feeds

    • How to Play Five Nights at Poppy

    You begin each night sitting in a small security office with monitors all around. Each screen shows different parts of the hospital—like patient rooms, hallways, and a morgue. Your main jobis to watch out for Poppy.

    Poppy moves slowly at first and switches back and forth between rooms. But as the nights go by, she becomes faster, sneakier, and more aggressive. She's not just creepy but also smart. If your cameras stay broken too long or you waste power-flipping switches, she'll strike. Here's what to keep track of:

    • Cameras: If one goes fuzzy or shows static, press and hold for a while to repair it.
    • Power: You have limited energy. Leaving doors closed or lights on drains it fast.
    • Corridors: Watch the left and right doors near your office. If you see glowing eyes, close the door fast!

Whether you're a fan of classic FNAF-style gameplay or want something more psychological, you'll find it here on OnlineGames.io. Get ready for more eerie soundtracks, flickering screens, and creepy enemies. And yes, headphones make it all 10x scarier.

name: Stickman GTA City
description:
You've been digging the internet for ages, looking for a free GTA game to play on your browser, only to end up with games that disappoint faster than a balloon losing air. You might have given up hope, reminiscing about the days of cruising through GTA San Andreas or Vice City with your bro. Think of how much you missed even hearing that iconic sound, the one that plays right as the screen fades to black with a bold "Wasted!" slapped across it? Ah, the good old days. But wipe that frown off your face because your miserable search ends here! We have brought you an online GTA game that captures the essence of San Andreas as much as possible. Stickman GTA City is a 3D action adventure game that you can play on your browser, absolutely free. You'll be stealing cars, dodging cops, and probably accidentally running over some stick pedestrians who didn't look both ways. And tanks? Helicopters? It's like Santa's gone rogue in the crime world!

Whether you're following orders from your Mafia Boss or just exploring the vast open world, Stickman GTA City lets you play it your way. Have fun!

Controls

Movement

  • W, A, S, D: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • LMB: Look Around
  • Shift: Sprint
  • C: Crouch
  • F: Enter or exit vehicles
  • W, A, S, D: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • LMB: Look Around
  • Shift: Sprint
  • C: Crouch
  • F: Enter or exit vehicles

    • Shooting / Attacking

    • Z: Aim
    • RMB or Ctrl: Shoot/Attack
    • R: Reload
    • 1-9 or Q key or Mouse Scroll: Switch Weapons
    • J, K, L Keys: Rocket Launcher, RDP and Barret
  • Z: Aim
  • RMB or Ctrl: Shoot/Attack
  • R: Reload
  • 1-9 or Q key or Mouse Scroll: Switch Weapons
  • J, K, L Keys: Rocket Launcher, RDP and Barret

    • ⚠ Mature Content Warning
    Stickman GTA City is recommended for mature players due to frequent violence, crime-focused missions, and intense action sequences. These elements may be unsuitable for younger audiences. If you prefer a more casual or family-friendly experience, check out other free games on our site. Player discretion is advised.

    How to Play Stickman GTA City

    • Start by picking a place to spawn on the GTA city map.
    • You'll begin with your first mission of evading the police and driving to the mafia escape house.
    • After completing the first mission, you're free to follow mafia missions or explore the city at your own pace. You can access main and side missions using Stickman's phone. Completing missions will bring lots of cash.  
    • Use your Stickman's skills to steal vehicles, take down enemies, and evade the cops. Collect money and weapons scattered across the city.
    • Check your Stickman's health level often. If health is zero, you need to start over!
  • Start by picking a place to spawn on the GTA city map.
  • You'll begin with your first mission of evading the police and driving to the mafia escape house.
  • After completing the first mission, you're free to follow mafia missions or explore the city at your own pace. You can access main and side missions using Stickman's phone. Completing missions will bring lots of cash.  
  • Use your Stickman's skills to steal vehicles, take down enemies, and evade the cops. Collect money and weapons scattered across the city.
  • Check your Stickman's health level often. If health is zero, you need to start over!

    • Note: Remember there's no one-size-fits-all approach to playing open-world games. So, grab the controls, go out there and find your own way. Maybe you can tell us about your story in the comment section below.

    Cheats

    Let's face it; sometimes you just want to fly around in a jetpack without all that pesky "earning it" stuff. Experiment with cheats using your in-game phone to make the game even more exciting. You can spawn tanks, helicopters and even jetpacks, fill your ammo or unlock new weapons without writing down those rusty cheat codes like GIVEUSATANK or GUNSGUNSGUNS.

    Stickman Skins

    Last but not least, you change your Stickman's skin in the shop. Each avatar comes with different power, health and attack stats, so you can decide if you want to be the Usain Bolt or the Hulk of stickmen.

    Developer

    Stickman GTA City is developed by FreezeNova.

    More Free GTA Games

    In the end, Stickman GTA City is the love child of chaos and simplicity, wrapped in a stick-figure blanket. It's not taking itself seriously, and neither should you. It's where you can enjoy the thrill of GTA without the guilt of actual crime - unless you count stick-figure murder and grand theft auto as crimes. Dive in, laugh a lot, and maybe learn that even stickmen have dreams of becoming crime lords. If you enjoy Stickman GTA City, don't forget to check out our other free GTA games for more action-packed fun! Play now and embrace the chaos!

name: Survival Race
description:
It's a race of survival. The one who stays in the arena wins the game. Steer on the platform at full speed, crash other cars, and drop them out. Survival Race is a free online car game offering a thrilling experience. Make stunts or roll over holes and collect coins in this battle royale racing game!

Controls

Desktops and Laptops

  • Steer Left: A/Left Arrow
  • Steer Right: D/Right Arrow
  • Jump: W/Up arrow/Spacebar/LMB
  • Fly: Double press W/Up arrow/Space
  • Steer Left: A/Left Arrow
  • Steer Right: D/Right Arrow
  • Jump: W/Up arrow/Spacebar/LMB
  • Fly: Double press W/Up arrow/Space

    • How to Play Survival Race?

    • The race starts immediately after pressing the play button. Steer your car over the arena.
    • The aim is to kick out all other cars to be the winner.
    • Stay away from corners to be on the safe side.
    • When another player drives on the arena, blocks will go down after it, leaving holes in the platform.
    • When a hole emerges in front of you, jump by pressing W.
    • You can also fly for a short period by pressing W twice.
    • Collect coins and power-ups on your way. Coins will bring you better cars, while powerups will make your car more resilient to attacks.
    • There are dozens of sports cars to unlock in the garage. If you'd like to change the color of your car, simply go to the garage in the main menu and select the color to stand out from the crowd in the arena.

    • Game Modes

    • Practice: Free race without opponents
    • Battle: Survive in the arena
    • Parkour: Collect stars
    • Autoball: Soccer played bar cars. Score goals to win.
  • Practice: Free race without opponents
  • Battle: Survive in the arena
  • Parkour: Collect stars
  • Autoball: Soccer played bar cars. Score goals to win.

    • Tips and Tricks for Survival Race

    • Roads are slippery. Don't oversteer; otherwise, your car will drift in a crazy way, resulting in a fall out of the arena.
    • Go to options to set your steering and drift levels.
    • Sharp steering and minimum drifting will provide you with more precision.

If you'd like to play more games like Survival Race, our recommendation is Crazy Car Arena. Achieve the highest score, you'll need to maneuver through narrow turns, loops, steep slopes, and fiery hoops. This game features great 3D visuals, and the music intensifies the need for speed. Various challenges will push your driving abilities to the limit.

    However, alternatives don't end here. OnlineGames.io offers hundreds of free car games, diligently selected by our editors. Look at all your options in the dedicated tag. Bookmark this website (Ctrl + D) to access it easily next time!

name: Sprunki
description:
Sprunki is a fun and creative music game where you can become a DJ. Dress up characters from a quirky band called the Sprunki by dragging and dropping cool clothes and accessories onto them. Each costume or accessory you choose adds a different musical sound, such as bass, melody, or drums. Enter the world of colorful Sprunkis, like Mr. Tree, Mr Sun, Lime and Garnold. If you're feeling extra whimsical, put the black hat on any member. And things will take a spooky turn. The theme gets darker, and visuals and sounds get scarier. Each hat and each accessory you put on makes the Sprunkis feel like they ran away from a horror movie.

Controls

  • Computers: Use your mouse to drag and drop accessories
  • Mobiles: Drag and drop accessories by tapping
  • Computers: Use your mouse to drag and drop accessories
  • Mobiles: Drag and drop accessories by tapping

    • How to Play Sprunki

    • Begin by picking a fun character from the lineup, each with its own special sound.
    • You'll see different outfits or accessories at the bottom.
    • Dress each of the Sprunks to give them unique sound elements.
    • You'll encounter quirky items like devil horns, tree and sun costumes, bunny ears and even satellite dishes along the way.  You cannot use an item on multiple Sprunks. If you'd like to reset the band, click on the replay button on the top right.
    • Mix and match different music loops and sounds to create beautiful melodies or experimental tracks.
    • If you want to concentrate on one character's sound, just hover over them and click the headphone icon to mute the others.  
    • Similarly, you can mute one's sound by hovering over them and clicking the mute icon.
    • Don't be afraid to experiment with different outfits to discover hidden musical surprises!

  • You'll see different outfits or accessories at the bottom.
  • Dress each of the Sprunks to give them unique sound elements.
  • You'll encounter quirky items like devil horns, tree and sun costumes, bunny ears and even satellite dishes along the way.  You cannot use an item on multiple Sprunks. If you'd like to reset the band, click on the replay button on the top right.

  • Similarly, you can mute one's sound by hovering over them and clicking the mute icon.
  • Don't be afraid to experiment with different outfits to discover hidden musical surprises!

    • What Is Sprunki Incredibox?

    Incredibox is a unique experimental music app that lets you conduct a group of beatboxers. Sprunki Incredibox originated as a fun, fan-made mode created by a 15-year-old Incredibox user named NyankoBfLol. It skyrocketed and quickly gained popularity, attracting an audience twice the size of the original Incredibox. What makes Sprunki truly unique is its shift from a joyful music game to a more eerie experience. The bright colors slowly change to darker shades, and your characters gain spooky looks. This creepy twist of this mode captured the imagination of users, leading to its own standalone game.

    Even more surprisingly, Sprunki characters have emerged as new horror mascots, joining the ranks of figures like the Rainbow Friends, Freddy Fazbear, Granny, and Poppy. Fans all around the world have contributed to the Sprunki hype in a way. Today, you can find Sprunks not only in online music-making games but also across various genres, such as horror games, platformers, trivia games, and more. For example, in Obby: Find Sprunki game, you can go for a Sprunki hunt and find hidden characters on an obstacle course. There are even fan fiction stories that explore themes around Sprunkis being orphans or having disabilities, adding depth to their intriguing lore. 

    Developer

    The original Incredibox mode was created by NyankoBfLol. This version of Sprunki game was created by Sprunki Games.

name: Granny
description:
Granny is a horror-puzzle game where your survival skills, quick thinking, and stealth will be working non-stop. This scary game takes place in a Granny's eerie house, where you wake up in a bloody bed and realize you're trapped. Your room's door is locked from the outside, and your ultimate goal is to escape from this hell. But it's not that simple. Granny has a surprisingly sharp hearing for her age. She is always on the hunt and has a knack for finding you. This game is a mix of fear, strategy, and problem-solving that will keep your heart racing and your mind working overtime. So, if you're ready for jumpscare moments, wear your headphones, hit the play button and see if you can escape from Granny's House!

⚠ Mature Content Warning
This horror game features intense fear-based elements, graphic imagery, and disturbing themes. It is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all players. If you’re sensitive to frightening content, please explore our other free games. Player discretion is advised.

Controls

For Computers:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Look around
  • E: Interact
  • C: Sit/Stand
  • R: Hide
  • Space: Throw objects
  • F: Escape traps

    • How to Play Granny

    • If you're new to the game or just want to explore without the heart-pounding chase, try Practice mode. Here, Granny is away, giving you a chance to plan your escape.
    • For those seeking a challenge, there are five difficulty levels to choose from, ranging from easy to extreme. Pick the level and hit start.
    • You have five attempts to succeed. Granny hears every sound, so tread carefully and avoid noisy mistakes like knocking over objects or stepping on creaky floors.
    • The house is filled with mysterious items like keys, closets, books, and tools. Press E to interact with them.
    • Each item has a purpose, but you'll need to figure out how to use them to unlock doors or access hidden areas. Explore the house, find clues, and solve puzzles.
    • Remember that there is no single way of escaping. In order to make a great getaway, you can try one of the multiple escape routes available. You can aim to unlock the front door or try fixing up the old car in the garage... It's up to you.

name: Five Nights At Freddy's 2
description:
Five Nights at Freddy's 2 (FNaF 2) is a popular horror game with a spooky environment and a thrilling narrative. If you have the courage for it, play it now for free on OnlineGames.io!

Controls

Desktops

  • Interact with lights: Mouse
  • Turn on flashlight: Hold Space
  • Wear a mask and access cameras: Hover the Mouse Over Two Panels
  • Interact with lights: Mouse
  • Turn on flashlight: Hold Space
  • Wear a mask and access cameras: Hover the Mouse Over Two Panels

    • What is the story of Five Nights at Freddy's?

    Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria opened with wild enthusiasm. The initial aim was to serve delicious pizzas and entertain customers' children with animatronics. However, the opening was followed by a series of tragic events. Reports of missing children after visits to Fazbear's Pizza began to surface. These reports caused widespread concern among the residents. Rumors about murders and horror stories started spreading. Some people claimed that the animatronics were haunted and even bit children to death.

    In one incident, an animatronic bit a security guard, resulting in his death. These rumors led to the closure of the restaurant, and the missing children were never found.

    In the sequel, Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the pizzeria reopens and needs new staff. They quickly find waiters and chefs but struggle to fill the night security guard position. No one wants to work the night shift in a haunted restaurant. But here you are on this singular page. Perhaps thinking, "What could go wrong? These must be just rumors. I need to pay my bills, and this job pays very well. I'll give this place a chance."

    Welcome to your new job: night shift security guard at Fazbear's Pizza. Keep your eyes open, we're beginning! Let's give you an onboarding before the mission!

    How to Play FNAF 2

    • Take on the role of a night security guard. You must survive five consecutive shifts at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria, working from 12 AM to 6 AM.
    • You may not feel nervous now, but this place gets very dark at night. Remember the rumors about the haunted animatronics? It's best to keep an eye on the security cameras to ensure none are approaching your location.
  • Take on the role of a night security guard. You must survive five consecutive shifts at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria, working from 12 AM to 6 AM.
  • You may not feel nervous now, but this place gets very dark at night. Remember the rumors about the haunted animatronics? It's best to keep an eye on the security cameras to ensure none are approaching your location.

    • Stay Alive

    • Your aim is to survive for five nights. The main threat is the animatronics, which can attack if you're not careful. Use the security cameras to track their movements. They can only move when you're not watching, so stay on alert.
  • Your aim is to survive for five nights. The main threat is the animatronics, which can attack if you're not careful. Use the security cameras to track their movements. They can only move when you're not watching, so stay on alert.

    • Manage Resources

    • You have a flashlight, but its battery is limited. Use it wisely and only when necessary.
  • You have a flashlight, but its battery is limited. Use it wisely and only when necessary.

    • Get Ready for Jumpscares!

    While monitoring the cameras, an animatronic might suddenly appear right in front of you. Prepare yourself for jump scares and play safely in this thrilling horror game!

name: Pixel Driver
description:
Sometimes, you just crave something simple. Nothing fancy. No complicated missions or stressful tasks. Just a pixel car, a colorful city, and the freedom to roam. That's it. These are exactly what Pixel Driver is all about.

In Pixel Driver, you'll hop into your pixel-style car and explore a colorful, bustling city made completely out of blocks. The city is lively with pixel police cars, fire trucks, and ambulances driving around, making the streets feel alive and busy.

This simple driving game beautifully combines old-school pixel graphics with modern 3D visuals, creating a fun and nostalgic atmosphere. You can race to beat your best time or just cruise to relax like in Slow Roads. It keeps things easy and enjoyable. So jump in your car, hit the gas, and enjoy the simplicity of driving around in this charming pixel world!

Controls

  • Drive with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Use nitro with Shift
  • Pause or open menu with Escape
  • Drive with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Use nitro with Shift
  • Pause or open menu with Escape

    • Game Modes

    In Pixel Driver, you have two fun ways to play:

    • Racing Mode: Race around the pixel city as fast as you can. Your goal is to beat your best time! Watch out for other AI-controlled cars roaming around. Use nitro to speed up on straight roads, but slow down for tight corners so you don't crash.
    • Free Drive Mode: Relax and explore the city without any pressure. Drive anywhere you like, check out cool spots, or practice your driving and drifting skills. You'll still see AI cars on the streets, adding life to your cruising experience.
  • Racing Mode: Race around the pixel city as fast as you can. Your goal is to beat your best time! Watch out for other AI-controlled cars roaming around. Use nitro to speed up on straight roads, but slow down for tight corners so you don't crash.
  • Free Drive Mode: Relax and explore the city without any pressure. Drive anywhere you like, check out cool spots, or practice your driving and drifting skills. You'll still see AI cars on the streets, adding life to your cruising experience.

    • Developer

    Pixel Driver was created by FreezeNova, famous for fun and easy-to-play online games for players of all ages.

    Explore Free Driving Games

    If you love driving games, OnlineGames.io is the perfect place to explore. You can find tons of exciting online car games, ranging from realistic driving simulators to fun arcade-style adventures like Pixel Driver. If you're into racing, drifting, performing wild stunts, or simply cruising around open-world maps, OnlineGames.io has you covered. Our free driving games are great for practicing your driving skills, competing with friends, or just chilling out after a long day. So if Pixel Driver has sparked your interest, dive deeper into the world of online driving games and discover your new favorite today! If you need further help, our suggestion is Madalin Stunt Cars 2. You'll get crazy stunts and fast cars. Start playing now!

name: Get On Top
description:
Remember those days when you and your brother used to wrestle for hours until one of you cried and complained to Mom? It was a real duel, wasn't it? You would flip over together like a human ball, with arms and legs flying in the air. So, we've brought sibling wrestling to the virtual realm. When Mom gets sick of your fights and forbids wrestling in the house, you can take your duel to the Get On Top game and resume your challenge in a less physical way.

You read that right: Get on Top is a 2-player stickman game where players combat with a friend, trying to get on top and make the opponent's head touch the ground. 

Controls

Computers

  • Left Player: A, D, W keys to control stickman
  • Right Player: Left, right and up arrows to control stickman
  • Left Player: A, D, W keys to control stickman
  • Right Player: Left, right and up arrows to control stickman

    • Mobile Devices

    • Use the relevant arrow buttons on the screen.
  • Use the relevant arrow buttons on the screen.

    • How to Play Get On Top?

    • Two game modes to choose: 1 Player against AI and 2 players 
    • The goal is to take control of the ragdoll and make it jump over the opponent. 
    • You win the round if the opponent's head hits the ground.
    • Score a point in 11 rounds to be the winner of the game.
  • Two game modes to choose: 1 Player against AI and 2 players 
  • The goal is to take control of the ragdoll and make it jump over the opponent. 
  • You win the round if the opponent's head hits the ground.
  • Score a point in 11 rounds to be the winner of the game.

    • Attack But Remember to Defend

    If you get zoned to attack your opponent, things may not go as you desire. Get On Top is a game with interesting physics; you may flip and hit your head to the ground while trying to attack your rival. 

    So, defense is also crucial. Try to keep your head and neck away from the floor. Move leftward and rightward to adjust the head skillfully in each position. Use your body mass as an advantage and shift it strategically. Take down your opponent! 

    Developer

    Neplin Game Studio made this game.

    Technology

    Construct 3

    What is Next?

    Did you know that rough play can actually help us safely explore and better understand our own aggression? It's true! On this basis, are you ready to take on the next exciting challenge? Head over to Boxing Random, another 2-player fighting game where you can seek revenge from your opponent.

name: Minecraft Classic
description:
All times best-selling game Minecraft is now available on your browser for free. Minecraft Classic is a player-driven sandbox game with endless possibilities. If you like playing games that improve creativity, you will find a lot to enjoy in this game. This version of Minecraft is filled with so many details, options, and features that you will not miss any feature of the original Minecraft game. 

You are free to dig, carve and build whatever you like: a mansion for yourself or a whole new city. It's all in your hands.

There are no monsters, enemies, or urgency to gather resources. Take it easy and discover the stress-free world of crafting.

You can play this game consisting of a creative mode of Minecraft for free on OnlineGames.io without downloading a single file. 

How to Play Minecraft Classic?

  • Open Minecraft Classic on OnlineGames.io and start generating a new level. 
  • There are two kinds of land: Flatgrass and Vanilla.
  • Flatgrass is an open world on a large flat map filled with grass, as the name suggests.
  • The Vanilla Map has a more diverse environment in terms of geography. This heaven-like map has plants, lakes, and even a beach.
  • After entering the map, feel free to explore every part of it. Left-click to break and right-click to build blocks around. You can see a more detailed list of keys to control at the bottom of this page. 
  • Minecraft Classic is a highly customizable game. You can change almost anything in the game to your preferences: graphics, texture packs, hotkeys, and even the color of the clouds. 
  • There are also nostalgia options that allow you to feel like you are playing pre-classic Minecraft in terms of both functionality and appearance.

name: Unpacking
description:
Hey there, neat freaks! We are offering you a great mess to tidy up! Unpacking is a free online home decoration and organization puzzle that you can play on your browser. You have just arrived at your new home, and it is time to open the boxes and unpack!📦

As you may have known from your mom's words, "Everything has its own place in this house. And they should be stored so." Solve tens of unpacking puzzles and tidy up this home.

How to Play Unpacking?

This place looks like a jam. Everything is tangled. We need your help in this. Organize the rooms and put every item in its unique place. If you are ready, let's start on how to tidy up this place properly!

Unpack Furniture

  • In the room section, there are lots of boxes and 11 eleven rooms in total waiting to be organized. 
  • Go to the rooms section from the main menu and choose a room to start with. The kitchen, bath, living room, bedroom, kids room, and even garden needs some unpacking. 
  • You will see the items disarrayed on the right side of your screen. 
  • Select one of the items and figure out where you should place it. 
  • When you find the correct place, the item's position will be locked. 
  • Repeat until you have nothing left on the right. 
  • Don't forget to take a screenshot of your work and share it with your friends. 
  • If you unpack the room in less than 90 seconds, you will be rewarded with 3 stars. And if you finish the level in over 150 seconds, you will only get 1 star. 
  • Get to the next level to organize the place in detail. Drawers, closets and wardrobes need more attention. Keep reading to learn how to organize them.

    • Organize Shelves

    If you have unpacked the big boxes and placed the furniture, it is time to fill the closets and shelves. In the main menu, click on the "Memory". Choose among the rooms to decorate in this section.

    • You have items waiting to be sorted out in the right. 
    • Find the places for these small items waiting on the right side. 
    • Drag the item to find where it belongs. If you place it correctly, the position will be locked as in the rooms puzzles.

  • Drag the item to find where it belongs. If you place it correctly, the position will be locked as in the rooms puzzles.

    • Arrange Drawers

    • Navigate to the main menu and select "Classic Mode" to start arranging drawers. 
    • You have items waiting to be sorted out in the right. 
    • You have boxes in various sizes in this puzzle. You should find the box with the correct size to store the items. 
    • You may see several of the same items. So it is better to divide them into groups at first.

    • Tips for Unpacking

    • It is completely normal to feel stuck sometimes. You can get hints by watching a short ad. In the hints, you will see a picture of the decorated room for a limited time.
    • If you successfully solved all the rooms, challenge yourself one more time to get all the stars you can.
    • It is always better to start with bigger furniture. Some items should be placed in the correct order. For example, if you are searching for where to put the pillow, you should first set the bed or sofa. Then, you will be able to place the pillow onto the bed properly.

name: Basket Hoop
description:
In Basket Hoop, gravity is your only challenge, and tapping is your sole weapon. Your goal is simple make the ball jump and send it inside the hoop. The charm of the one button games peaks in Basket Hoop online. Make as many baskets as you can in a limited amount of time. This game brings the same joy of playing Skeeball in arcade rooms, but with an extra: longer play sessions than you'd get with a single token.

Controls

Computer:

Use your mouse to shoot the ball.

Mobile:

Tap to shoot the ball

How to Play Basket Hoop

  • Tap or click on anywhere on the screen to dunk the ball.
  • You can jump the ball mid-air as well. Control the angle to land the ball in the hoop.
  • You have 5 seconds to make a score. If you miss a score within the time limit, the ball will return from the other side for another chance.
  • Each successful shot will create a new net in a different position for your next attempt.
  • Continue tapping to jump and shoot as many baskets as possible before the time runs out.
  • If you run out of time without scoring enough baskets, restart and aim to beat your personal best!
  • Tap or click on anywhere on the screen to dunk the ball.
  • You can jump the ball mid-air as well. Control the angle to land the ball in the hoop.
  • You have 5 seconds to make a score. If you miss a score within the time limit, the ball will return from the other side for another chance.
  • Each successful shot will create a new net in a different position for your next attempt.
  • Continue tapping to jump and shoot as many baskets as possible before the time runs out.
  • If you run out of time without scoring enough baskets, restart and aim to beat your personal best!

    • Ball Shop

    We know the game name is "Basket Hoop" and it takes place in a basketball field, but that doesn't mean you have to stick with a traditional ball! Explore the Ball Shop by tapping on the shop icon. You'll find 27 unlockable balls. From tennis balls and volleyballs to golf balls and Pokéballs, there's a wide range of choices that offer faster gameplay than the default ball. Use your in-game coins to purchase these unique options and complete your collection.

    Tips and Tricks

    • Pay close attention to the rhythm of your taps. Timing is key to making those perfect shots! At the beginning of the game you'll see the pathway the ball should follow for perfect shots. Try to stick with that path for high scores.
    • Try out different balls from the Ball Shop. Each type has its unique speed and trajectory, which can help you find the best fit for your playstyle.
    • Unlock new fields that comes with extra time limit. Even though you have five seconds to perform the dunk in the default field, you can unlock 5 more fields that come with extra seconds. Beating high scores will be much easier when you have more time.   
    • Try to chain successful baskets together (streaks) for bonus points. The faster you score, the more points you'll rack up!
