name: Stickman Destruction
description:
How many parts can you divide a virtual character into? Stickman Destruction is an action-oriented stickman ragdoll game in which you tear the virtual character apart a million times. The whole point of this game is to break the Stickman’s bones as much as possible by hitting him from right to left! Use your creativity and strategically calculate how you can get the most points. Break as many bones as you can and earn points!

How to play Stickman Destruction?

The whole purpose of Stickman Destruction is to increase the damage the character takes and gain points by creating as many obstacles as possible. You have 22 different map options, and every one of them has various obstacle alternatives. By earning points, you can get these map options and create a more dangerous environment.

How can I create obstacles in Stickman Destruction?

You can create obstacles in numerous ways. 

  • As mentioned, you can unlock new levels like Big Stairs or Free Slide. These maps offer you a variety of hurdles. Thus, allows you different damage setups.
  • You can change the character’s jump positions by clicking Next Pose or Prev Pose and choosing whichever is best for significant damage. 
  • Adjust the jump speed by tapping and holding to Start. The faster the jump, the greater the damage the Stickman takes.
  • Like unlocking new levels, you can unlock different vehicles, too. There are 11 vehicles. You can choose one of them and increase the number of broken bones.
  • You have two aid tools, Magnet and Vane Bamboo, which you can get from the left side of the screen. You can get them with your points or by watching videos.
  • Additionally, various tools named Props are at your disposal to deal the most damage.

name: Rooftop Duel
description:
Can you handle a rooftop shoot-out with gravity, ragdoll limbs, and a toybox of overpowered weapons? The recoil is wild here. Rooftop Duel piles all the goofy physics of classic ragdoll games. You'll try to knock off your opponent on a city rooftop. Press play and you hop straight into a duel; There are no downloads, no sign-ups; just jump, aim, and laugh as you and your opponent rocket each other off narrow city rooftops.

Grab a friend or fly solo, hit Play, and see how long you can stay on the roof. Just don't blame the game when you're laughing too hard to aim straight!

Let's get to the controls and game modes together:

Controls

Player 1

  • W / Right Mouse : Jump
  • Hold E / Left Mouse : Aim
  • Release E / Release Left-Mouse : Shoot
  • W / Right Mouse : Jump
  • Hold E / Left Mouse : Aim
  • Release E / Release Left-Mouse : Shoot

    • Player 2

    • I : Jump
    • Hold O : Aim
    • Release O : Shoot
  • I : Jump
  • Hold O : Aim
  • Release O : Shoot

    • How to Play Rooftop Duel

    Once the round loads, both ragdoll fighters try to balance on a rooftop. Tap jump, hold to aim, then let go to shoot. Every shot packs recoil, so a blast can rescue you from the edge or fling you into mid-air.

    Floaty jumps give you a moment to dodge an incoming bullet, or if you mistime things, you'll sail straight into the abyss. If you stay up while your opponent falls, you win the round, collect coins, and head back to the shop for an even sillier weapon before the next rooftop showdown.

    Game Modes

    Rooftop Duel has three main game modes that offer different ways to play depending on whether you're playing alone or with a friend.

    • 2 Player Mode: local multiplayer mode where two players share the same keyboard. Each player uses their own set of keys to jump and shoot. First player uses W and E while the second uses I and O keys. The round continues until one player knocks the other off the rooftop. You'll play 5 rounds to complete a match. This mode is only available on devices with a keyboard, so it is best played on a laptop or desktop. If you're using a mobile, try other modes instead.
    • Missions Mode: a series of short levels, each with a specific objective. It's a good place to start if you want to get used to the controls, learn how different weapons behave, and see new rooftops each round.
    • Survivor Mode: the goal is to stay alive for as long as possible. You'll face a continuous wave of enemies. The difficulty increases the longer you last. This mode requires a bit quicker reactions and good control compared to other modes. It's recommended to unlock more powerful weapons before playing, as basic gear can make it difficult to survive for long.
  • 2 Player Mode: local multiplayer mode where two players share the same keyboard. Each player uses their own set of keys to jump and shoot. First player uses W and E while the second uses I and O keys. The round continues until one player knocks the other off the rooftop. You'll play 5 rounds to complete a match. This mode is only available on devices with a keyboard, so it is best played on a laptop or desktop. If you're using a mobile, try other modes instead.
  • Missions Mode: a series of short levels, each with a specific objective. It's a good place to start if you want to get used to the controls, learn how different weapons behave, and see new rooftops each round.
  • Survivor Mode: the goal is to stay alive for as long as possible. You'll face a continuous wave of enemies. The difficulty increases the longer you last. This mode requires a bit quicker reactions and good control compared to other modes. It's recommended to unlock more powerful weapons before playing, as basic gear can make it difficult to survive for long.

    • Developer

    Rooftop Duel is cooked up by FreezeNova, the studio behind a stack of popular unblocked ragdoll games like Soccer Random Pro.

    More Gun Games Online

    If you're hooked on floppy firefights, try Total Recoil next. In this game, you're a soldier fighting off waves of angry robots in a factory. Each time you shoot, recoil makes you bounce in the opposite direction. Survive 30 challenging levels, dodge falling rockets, and collect coins to unlock new characters. All gun games on OnlineGames.io are free and playable right in your browser perfect for quick, commitment free sessions. Give it a try if you're up for another chaotic shooter!

name: Spacebar Clicker
description:
Try not to wear out the key button you use a lot in Spacebar Clicker! It is a 2D clicker game where you press the space key as many times as you can. This way, you will earn points. Use them to get booster monkeys and boomer moms. They will help you gain more in the idle game! 🐒

About Spacebar Clicker

There is a huge space bar in cream color on the screen. Your objective in this clicker game is to hit it and earn points. Every time you click on the key, you will get a +1 point. When you collect specific figures of points, you can get boosters. They will greatly benefit you by allowing you to gain more.

To accelerate hitting speed, you can use both the space key on the screen and the actual button on your computer at the same time. It will double up your earnings. Or, you can try other combinations to get fast.

The Boosters of Spacebar Clicker

As you tap on the bar and get enough points, you will see boosters on the screen. There are many of them and as you earn scores, they will show themselves under each other. You can find brief explanations about them below.

  • Monkey: This monkey doesn’t know where the key button is, but it randomly hits all the buttons. It achieves success every 5 seconds.
  • Boomer Mom: Boomer Moms don’t know much about computers. So, they will constantly click on the screen. Each one of them will earn you 3 points in a second.
  • Gen Z Kid: These children grew up with computers, but they do not generally use key buttons. They only know how to scroll down, but they can get you 20 points in a second.
  • Keyboard Upgrade: When you click on the bar, Keyboard Upgrade will earn you a double score.
  • Monkey: This monkey doesn’t know where the key button is, but it randomly hits all the buttons. It achieves success every 5 seconds.
  • Boomer Mom: Boomer Moms don’t know much about computers. So, they will constantly click on the screen. Each one of them will earn you 3 points in a second.
  • Gen Z Kid: These children grew up with computers, but they do not generally use key buttons. They only know how to scroll down, but they can get you 20 points in a second.
  • Keyboard Upgrade: When you click on the bar, Keyboard Upgrade will earn you a double score.

    • Speed Up Your Hitting

    Until you acquire boosters, you will earn points very slowly. To accelerate your hit speed, you can combine different tapping combinations with each other. While pressing the spacebar with your index finger, you can also perform a double hit by using the mouse pad with your thumb.

    Controls

    Desktops and Computers

    • Space Key/Mouse: Earn Points
  • Space Key/Mouse: Earn Points

    • Use the virtual bar on the screen to score.

name: OvO
description:
You are faced with time! OvO Game is a strategic arcade game that requires stamina. It would help if you had a fast adaptation. Only some people can handle it. If you believe in yourself, come join us! But keep in mind that there are many ups and downs and slides. It comes with dizziness. However, it is well worth it.

How to Play the OvO Game?

Feel free to use your Arrow keys.

  • Use Arrow Up to move forward
  • Use Arrow Down to move backward
  • Use Arrow Left to move left
  • Use Arrow Right to move right
  • Use the Spacebar to jump
  • Use Arrow Up to move forward
  • Use Arrow Down to move backward
  • Use Arrow Left to move left
  • Use Arrow Right to move right
  • Use the Spacebar to jump

    • Tips and Tricks

    OvO is a complicated and enjoyable game, but by playing it correctly, you can get more from it. The following hints, techniques, and suggestions will improve your gameplay and make the experience more pleasurable.

    • Learn the controls. Spend a few minutes getting acquainted with the game's rules before playing. Swiping in various directions will be necessary to move the ball and avoid obstacles.
    • Be careful! Many of the barriers in OvO can potentially make you lose the game, so be careful. Plan your movements properly and watch for spikes, fire pits, and other dangers.
    • Use your power-ups. Power-ups are there for you to help you get through a challenging level. They will be helpful for you to use them efficiently.
    • Collect coins. Build your way up to collect the coins in the game, as you may use them to buy a new outfit for your character.

    Power-ups are another game feature that helps you move through the levels. These power-ups can increase your speed, render you invulnerable, or give you the ability to jump over obstacles. You must strategically use these power-ups in order to accomplish the missions.

    How many levels are in OvO?

The journey begins with Basics and continues with Getting Serious, Higher Order, Mechanics, OvO Space Program, Journey through the Portal, and Community Levels, respectively. Each level is getting harder and harder. You will see a variety of obstacles in your way. So, you need to remain firm.

name: Pacman 30th Anniversary
description:
Who is not afraid of ghosts? Pac-man is!

In the neon glow of 1980s arcades, a little yellow character with the shape of a pizza missing a slice was born. This little guy is scared by ghosts, like every other kid. But when he eats energizers, he threatens all ghosts. The creator of the original game, Toru Itawani, describes the relationship between Pac-Man and ghosts as the ones Tom & Jerry have.

The world's most-known game, Pac-Man, is released as a Google Doodle to celebrate the 30th Anniversary of the game's initial release. You can even see the Google logo implemented in the maze on the first level. How cool is that? Google’s special version of the game brought better graphics and HUD, as well as easy access via browser.

While Pacman's fame is undeniable, there was a clear need for an ultimate guide that covered everything you needed to know about this iconic character. Keep reading this post to learn how to play, explore fun facts and world records, and find answers to frequently asked questions about the game itself and the Google Doodle version.

    How to Play Pac-Man 30th Anniversary

    • For a retro feel of arcade machines, open the link provided above to start the game.
    • You will control a little yellow character in a maze. Guide him through the maze to collect all the dots.
    • Avoid your archenemies: four crazy ghosts named Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde. Each ghost has different colors and behaviors, but all share the goal of catching you. 
    • Eat power pellets (bigger dots) to make the ghosts turn blue, making them defenseless against Pac-Man. 
    • When the ghosts turn blue, they will start to run away from you, and Pac-Man will be the one chasing. Gobble ghosts to clear the maze. But be quick; the pellet's effect will fade out soon.
    • Collect all dots in a maze to pass a level.
    • You may see fruits appearing in the maze once in a while. Eating fruits will boost your game score as it affects your health in real life. 
    • If a ghost(s) catches him, you have to start over.
    • The game gets trickier as you go, with faster ghosts and shorter energizer effects. Outsmart the ghosts and break records with your scores.

    Pac-Man's Fame

    • The game is not only the most famous video game of all time, but it is an icon of pop culture. It has brought its fame into sequels, music, and TV Shows. 
    • A hit song called "Pac-Man Fever" by Buckner & Garcia got into the list of 100 Greatest One Hit Wonders of the 80s.
    • Posters, mugs, t-shirts, and a wide range of objects featuring Pac-Man are sold for millions.
    • Business folks use the term "Pac-Man defense" for a hostile takeover move. This term has taken its place in the curriculums of management courses in business schools.
    • A technique used in math and physics is called "Pacman renormalization."
    • The game entered The Strong National Museum of Play's Hall of Fame in 2015.
    • When Google first released the Pacman Doodle, it was played for 500 million hours by visitors, in the first 48 hours. The Google Pacman craze caused businesses to lose 122 million $ in such a short time.

    • Fun Facts

    • The game was first called "Puck Man" in Japan, referring to the character's open mouth and eating habits. However, it changed to "Pac-Man" later in North America.
    • The idea for Pac-Man's look came from a pizza with a slice missing. 🍕

    • In 1982, a kid got a letter from President Ronald Reagan for a world-record score. 
    • The game holds eleven Guinness World Records, including the most successful coin-operated game record. Keep reading to learn about records held by Pacman.

    • Guinness World Records

    Pac-Man is super famous that it has dozens of World Records recognized by Guinness. The game itself acquired 11 Guinness certificates. However, the game opened the way for other records for fans worldwide, such as the highest score or fastest completion. Learn about them below.

    • FAQ

    What is Pac-Man Google Doodle?

    Pac-Man Google Doodle is a re-make of the retro arcade game Pac-Man to celebrate the 30th Anniversary of the game's initial release in May 1980.

    How old is Google Pacman?

    As of 2024, Google Pac-Man is 14 years old while the original Pac-Man is 44 years old.

    When was Google Pacman released?

    Google released the game in May 2010 in 30th anniversary of the original game.

    Who developed Google Pacman?

    Pacman's 30th Anniversary Doodle was made by Google. The original Pacman game was created by Toru Iwatani in 1979.

    How many levels does Pac-Man Doodle have?

    As in original Pacman, there are 256 levels in Pac-Man Doodle, with increasing difficulty.

    How does Pac-Man end?

    A level in Pac-Man ends if a ghost catches the character. Then, the player should start over from the beginning. However, no player could reach the end of the final level, known as Map 256.

    What is level 256 in Pac-Man?

    Level 256 is the final and hardest level of the game. The map is also known as the split-screen level because, in this stage, the screen splits into two parts. While the left side stays as usual, the right side is filled with random numbers, letters and symbols.

    In this map, the player needs to collect 244 Pac-dots to beat the level. However, as the right side is filled with a mess of symbols and lacks Pac-dots, it is impossible to reach 244 dots.

    The most points earned in this kill level is 155,875, which was scored by Marc Cohen on the PS4.

    Why is Pacman's 256th level glitched?

    When a player finishes a level, a bonus fruit appears in the screen's bottom right corner. After the 8th level, each time you pass a level, the last icon in the bottom right corner changes to show you which map the player is on.

    Retro arcade machines could only remember a small amount of information, like a single byte. This meant they could only count up to 255. Each level in the game is given a number from 1 to 255.

    When you reach Level 256, the game tries to use the number 0. In this case, the game ends up trying to show all 255 fruits from the previous levels on the screen, leading to a glitch on the right side of the game.

    How to play 2 player Pac-Man on Google?

    You can bust ghosts with a friend on the co-op mode of Pac-Man. Open Pacman 2 Player above and click the "Insert Coin" button twice. Then, Mrs. Pac-Man also appears on the screen. You can control Pacman with arrow keys and Mrs. Pacman with WASD keys.  

    Inserting the Last Coin

    Pac-Man is not just a game; it's a cultural milestone, a soundtrack, a fashion statement, and a lesson in strategy that extends the pixels on the screen. If you want to explore arcade games further, our platform provides you with tons of free online games. Discover, play and have fun for free, just a click away!

name: Fleeing the Complex
description:
Henry Stickmin: Fleeing the Complex is a funny adventure story game packed with action, humor, and loads of unexpected twists. It’s the fifth game in the Henry Stickmin series and continues right after Infiltrating the Airship. This time, things get more intense as Henry wakes up inside The Wall (no, not the one on Game of Thrones, but similar concepts)  It’s a cold, high-security prison set in the snowy mountains of Canada. This place isn't just any prison. It's where the world’s most dangerous criminals are locked away, and guess what? Henry's just joined them. Honestly, what did he expect? After breaking into a bank, escaping from prison, and stealing a priceless Tunisian diamond, he wasn’t exactly headed for a beach vacation. A cold, heavily-guarded prison complex? Yeah… that sounds about right. But it’s Henry. He cannot wait, hands tied. He must find a way to flee from the complex. And that’s where you start to guide him and determine his fate with your choices. Let’s take a look at how this fifth game starts: 

The warden, Dmitri J. Petrov, sees Henry as a serious threat in the complex. So he and his right-hand man Grigori toss him into a transfer cell. That’s when the fun begins. With nothing to lose, Henry must figure out how to escape. You, the player, get to make every key decision. Will Henry tackle guards, play dead, call in some big favors, or maybe team up with fellow inmate Ellie Rose? Every choice you make could lead to success... or complete failure (with funny results).

Controls

Mouse click to choose actions and make decisions

How to Play Fleeing the Complex

  • Watch the short intro cutscene. Henry has just arrived at The Wall.
  • When a decision point appears, pick one of the available options.
    Each choice takes the story in a different direction. Some paths lead to freedom, others to funny fail moments of Henry.
  • If you fail, no worries! You can go back and try a different choice without restarting the whole game.
  • Keep experimenting with different choices to unlock all five main endings: Ghost Inmate, Convict Allies, Presumed Dead, International Rescue Operative, and The Betrayed. Plus, there are over 60 funny fail moments to discover along the way.
  • Watch the short intro cutscene. Henry has just arrived at The Wall.
  • When a decision point appears, pick one of the available options.
    Each choice takes the story in a different direction. Some paths lead to freedom, others to funny fail moments of Henry.
  • If you fail, no worries! You can go back and try a different choice without restarting the whole game.
  • Keep experimenting with different choices to unlock all five main endings: Ghost Inmate, Convict Allies, Presumed Dead, International Rescue Operative, and The Betrayed. Plus, there are over 60 funny fail moments to discover along the way.

    • Who Made Fleeing the Complex?

    Fleeing the Complex was created by PuffballsUnited, the same developer behind the entire Henry Stickmin series. The game later became part of The Henry Stickmin Collection on PC and consoles, but you can still play this version free online on your browser without flash plugins!

    All Henry Stickmin Games Online

    If you want to experience the full Henry Stickmin saga, here’s the official game order. Each game builds on the last, with returning characters, fun callbacks, and evolving storylines based on your choices.

  • Breaking the Bank Where it all begins. Henry tries (and fails) to rob a bank. It’s short, simple, and sets the tone for the series' funny trial-and-error style.
  • Escaping the Prison: After getting caught, Henry finds himself behind bars. Your choices will help him break out.
  • Stealing the Diamond: With freedom comes ambition. Henry sets out to steal a huge diamond from a museum. Expect ridiculous gadgets and even more ridiculous outcomes.
  • Infiltrating the Airship: Henry is hired by the government to take down a group of air pirates. Will he succeed or betray them? You decide.
  • Fleeing the Complex (You're here): Captured again and locked away in a frozen prison fortress, Henry must plan his boldest escape yet.

    • All of these were later combined in The Henry Stickmin Collection for PC, which includes a final sixth game, Completing the Mission, only available in the paid collection. It ties together all your previous choices into one big, action-packed finale. But if you're just looking to play the classic flash games for free, you're in luck! The first five Henry Stickmin games are available to play online for free right here on OnlineGames.io. No download, no cost, just pure chaotic fun. Whether you're here for the crazy escape plans, the funny animations, or just want to see all the ways things can go wrong, Fleeing the Complex is one of the best online games to play for free. Try every path and see if you can help Henry pull off the perfect escape!

name: Papa's Sushiria
description:
Ever accidentally broke something... and somehow ended up running a whole restaurant because of it? That's exactly what happens in Papa's Sushiria. One minute you're visiting the newest sushi place in town, and the next. BAM! You're rolling rice, slicing tuna, and shaking up bubble teas like a pro.

Now it's on you to keep the sushi bar running smoothly. Take customer orders, cook everything just right, and don't forget the boba drinks. Whether you're into California rolls or loaded spicy combos, you'll get to build them all. It's fast, it's fun, and yeah, it gets a little chaotic, just like real food service.

Controls

  • Use your mouse to navigate menus, select ingredients, and complete all tasks.
  • Click, drag, and hold to prepare food items step-by-step.
  • Use your mouse to navigate menus, select ingredients, and complete all tasks.
  • Click, drag, and hold to prepare food items step-by-step.

    • How to Play Papa's Sushiria

    Running Papa's Sushiria might sound overwhelming at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's super satisfying. Everything starts when a customer walks in and places their order. You'll need to pay close attention to what they want—every little detail counts, from the type of rice to the fillings, sauces, and even their bubble tea preferences.

    Once you've got the order down, it's time to cook the rice. This part is all about timing. You scoop the right amount, start the cooker, and wait for it to finish. Don't leave it too long or it'll burn. While it cooks, you can get things ready for the next steps.

    Next comes the fun part: building the sushi roll. Lay out the seaweed, spread the rice, stack the fillings in the right order, then roll it up just right. It might take a couple tries to get perfect, but it feels great when you nail it. After rolling, you'll slice the sushi evenly and add any toppings or sauces the customer asked for. Presentation really matters here.

    Then it's off to the drink station. Most customers want a bubble tea to go with their food, so you'll need to pick the correct tea, the flavor, and how much ice and boba to add. It's a mini-game on its own and a fun way to break things up.

    Once everything's ready, hand the order over and see how you did. The customer will rate you based on accuracy, timing, and how neat everything looks. High scores mean bigger tips, which you can use for upgrades, new furniture, or snazzy uniforms. As you level up, more ingredients and customers unlock, making each day a little more exciting—and a little more hectic!

    Developer

    Papa's Sushiria was created by Flipline Studios, known for their entire lineup of fun restaurant and time management games.

    More Online Papa's Games to Play Next

    Love the satisfying rhythm of cooking and serving? You'll probably enjoy other Papa's titles like Papa's Burgeria and Papa's Pancakeria. All of these are browser-based, fun, and free to play online on OnlineGames.io!

    You can begin a game by joining a room made by other players or create a room yourself. To create a room, you must give a name to the room and decide on the maximum number of players. After that, choose the game mode, round time, bot count, and map.

name: Suroi
description:
In a post-apocalyptic 2D world, you awaken with nothing in your pockets but the will to survive in your heart. Wander around the arena for anything that might help you survive in a place swarming with enemies. Found a bottle of cola? Toss it in your backpack. Did you see a vest and helmet? Gear up for protection. Come across an MP40 or a box of grenades? Consider yourself lucky; you're making progress!

Suroi io is an online multiplayer survival game inspired by Surviv.io. Your mission: gather loot, chests, weapons, medkits, and whatever else you can find to survive in this hostile environment. Explore, avoid enemies, and that toxic orange gas. Collect your essentials and eliminate opponents. Soon, they'll be the ones fleeing from you. Dominate the field and carve your name on the leaderboard.

Controls

    • First, collect armor, weapons, medikits, and ammo.
    • To find them, enter abandoned houses, break into closets, or open boxes by left-clicking—press F to equip your findings.
    • Once you're armed enough, defend your team and take down opponents. Dodge enemy attacks and send them to spectator mode to watch how you've got there!

    • Healing Items

    In duo mode, you can revive your teammate, and they can revive you. In solo mode, you're on your own, so stock up on healing items. Save especially the Medikits for an emergency when you need it. Here's what you need to know to stay in the fight:

    • Gauze: Restores 15 health
    • Medikit: Restores 100 health
    • Cola: Restores 25 adrenaline
    • Tablets: Restore 50 adrenaline

name: Carnage Battle Arena
description:
Buckle up and play Carnage Battle Arena online! This free browser game turns every fender‑bender into a shower of Lego‑style blocks. Pick one of 80‑plus rideable bricks, dive onto wild maps, and smack into rivals until their bumpers scatter across the asphalt. Each ding knocks parts clean off your car. Just as you used to play with your Lego cars when you were a kid. But here, a quick drift, mid‑air spin, a cool stunt, or a healing kit will snap those blocks right back on.

With league shows, stadium soccer rounds, open‑world freedrive, classic lap races, survival showdowns, and high‑score hunts, there's always a new reason to floor it after school. Think Rocket League meets Demolition Derby, rebuilt out of toy bricks, and yes, it runs perfectly, right in your Chromebook.

Controls

Computers

  • Drive: W / A / S / D or arrow keys
  • Drift: C
  • Nitro: Shift
  • Jump: Space
  • Spin‑flip: double‑tap S or down arrow
  • Shoot cannon: E (after you grab one)
  • Pause: Esc
  • Drive: W / A / S / D or arrow keys
  • Drift: C
  • Nitro: Shift
  • Jump: Space
  • Spin‑flip: double‑tap S or down arrow
  • Shoot cannon: E (after you grab one)
  • Pause: Esc

    • How to Play Carnage Battle Arena

    • Pick a mode. Want nonstop wrecks? Hop into Death Match. Craving laps? Try Racing. Need chill time? Freedrive lets you roam and practice tricks.
    • Drive over floating cannons to bolt a turret to your roof, or snag green healing kits to glue fallen blocks back in place.
    • Drifting corners or landing a 360º flip mid‑air repairs damage and fills your boost bar, so show off.
    • Win, earn coins, unlock more rides. Each victory feeds your garage. Collect muscle cars and even a blocky school bus. And if you replace tires with giant ones, you can turn any vehicle in your garage into a monster truck.
  • Pick a mode. Want nonstop wrecks? Hop into Death Match. Craving laps? Try Racing. Need chill time? Freedrive lets you roam and practice tricks.
  • Drive over floating cannons to bolt a turret to your roof, or snag green healing kits to glue fallen blocks back in place.
  • Drifting corners or landing a 360º flip mid‑air repairs damage and fills your boost bar, so show off.
  • Win, earn coins, unlock more rides. Each victory feeds your garage. Collect muscle cars and even a blocky school bus. And if you replace tires with giant ones, you can turn any vehicle in your garage into a monster truck.

    • Tips & Tricks

    • Drift on purpose. A quick tap of C around every corner keeps your health topped and fills nitro for the next straightaway.
    • Mid‑air spins matter. Double‑press S just before a jump; a donut drift not only looks cool but can fully repair your car.
    • Soccer tricks. In football mode, ramming the ball with nitro gives it extra lift, which is perfect for top‑corner shots.
    • Survival smarts. Hide behind wrecks until only a few cars remain, then grab a cannon and finish the job.
    • Map memory. Healing kits respawn at fixed spots. Learn the locations and loop through them like a health circuit.
  • Drift on purpose. A quick tap of C around every corner keeps your health topped and fills nitro for the next straightaway.

    • Developer

    Carnage Battle Arena is built by BoomBit S.A.

    Features

    • Block‑by‑block damage: every crash pops bricks off your ride, so you literally watch your health fall to the pavement.
    • Six core modes: League, Football Challenges, Racing, Survival, Score Battle, Freedrive.
    • 82 unlockable vehicles: from tiny go‑karts to chunky tanks, each with unique brick shapes.
    • Dozens of arenas & tracks: city streets, desert bowls, stunt parks, even a giant football stadium.
    • Easy healing tricks: drift, spin, or catch power‑ups to snap your car back together without pit stops.
    • Cannon pickups: run over a glowing crate to mount rapid‑fire blasters and turn the race into a shoot‑out.

All of our crash and smash games run right in your browser and keep the "drive, destroy, repeat" vibe rolling after Carnage Battle Arena.

name: A Small World Cup
description:
Forget all those other soccer games where players throw the ball toward the goalposts. This time, we're throwing the players at the ball and crossing our fingers it somehow turns into a goal!

A Small World Cup is a funny 2 player soccer game with pixelated visuals where the players (yes, the ragdoll ones) do all the heavy lifting... or slamming. Instead of carefully lining up a shot, you'll aim your ragdoll footballer, pull back, and release for a full-speed dive at the ball. It's chaotic, it's funny, and it's as unpredictable as it sounds!

Prepare to laugh, strategize (kind of), and accidentally score on yourself—because in this game, anything can happen!

You can pick your national team and compete in 1v1 matches to win cups like the Euro Cup 2024, World Cup, America Cup and more.

Controls

For Computers:

  • Hold LMB to aim, release to send
  • Hold LMB to aim, release to send

    • For Mobiles:

    • Tap and hold to aim release to send
  • Tap and hold to aim release to send

    • How to Play A Small World Cup

    • Pick from 8 glorious tournaments: World Cup Classic, World Cup 2022, Euro Cup 2024, America Cup, or dive into club territory with options like Euro Clubs, Italian Clubs, English Clubs, and Other Clubs.
    • Pick your mode: normal or golden goal.
      • Normal Mode: Classic 45-second matches to prove you're the best—or bump it to 90 seconds if you like dragging out your victories.
      • Golden Goal Mode: One goal wins it all. Quick, brutal, and perfect for those who live on the edge.
    • Choose from a range of countries, and don't worry—your choice just changes the shirt color, not your skill level. The game then kindly assigns you a random opponent who is equally as clueless.

    • When the Match Starts

    • Hit the start and let the madness begin! It's a 1v1 showdown where YOU are the offense and the defense.

name: Drift Boss
description:
Say hi to an easily controlled and captivating game! Drift Boss is a 3D driving game where you steer your little car over sharp bends. No brakes are holding you. Drift through the corners and swing into high gear. The aim is to drive as long as possible without falling into space.

Drift Boss makes such a deep addiction that you will be surprised how simple mechanics make this possible. Don't forget to share your highest score with us in the comment section below!

How to Play Drift Boss?

  • Hit the start button and activate a booster if you have one.
  • Press the spacebar (or left click) to turn right and release the control to turn left.
  • The path you drive on has no ends, so you set your own goals.
  • Beat your highest score, or challenge your friends and be the boss of drifting!
  • Hit the start button and activate a booster if you have one.
  • Press the spacebar (or left click) to turn right and release the control to turn left.
  • The path you drive on has no ends, so you set your own goals.
  • Beat your highest score, or challenge your friends and be the boss of drifting!

    • Drift Like a Boss: Boosters

    Three kinds of boosters are available in Drift Boss: Double score, car insurance, and coin rush. You can activate the boosters for only one run, and they will make your run easier for a while. You need to set the booster before driving.

    • Car Insurance: This booster will insure your car for one fall in a run. If you fall into space, you can continue where you left off by using your insurance.
    • Double Score: This will double your score through the run.
    • Coin Rush: This booster will fill your roads with coins. A great option if you are planning to buy a new vehicle.
  • Car Insurance: This booster will insure your car for one fall in a run. If you fall into space, you can continue where you left off by using your insurance.
  • Double Score: This will double your score through the run.
  • Coin Rush: This booster will fill your roads with coins. A great option if you are planning to buy a new vehicle.

    • How do I earn boosters in Drift Boss?

    If you are out of boosters,

    • you can buy them with your coins💰 
    • you can turn the spin wheel and cross your fingers for the best 🎰
    • check in every day to take daily prizes🎁
  • you can buy them with your coins💰 
  • you can turn the spin wheel and cross your fingers for the best 🎰
  • check in every day to take daily prizes🎁

    • Need Some Tips? 

    Here are the tips and tricks for Drift Boss:

    • Don't steer too early. Wait until when you are close to the bend, then make your turn.
    • Are you frustrated falling down over and over? Try to buy a new vehicle; more expensive cars have better grip. Then, you will enjoy a longer ride without thinking about the sliding distance.
    • You can turn your car on the air if you come across a bend right after jumping.
    • Remember to get your daily rewards and practice. You will soon be an Ultimate Drift Boss!

name: Idle Breakout
description:
Idle Breakout is a free online clicker game with arcade mechanics. The aim is to break all the bricks in a room. With hundreds of levels, this brick-breaker game provides endless gameplay. Click on the bricks or employ balls. Upgrade balls' power and speed, use lasers, and get all the ribbons! When you pass all the levels, proceed to the next prestige to be an ultimate brickbreaker! 

How to Play Idle Breakout

  • Start destroying blocks by clicking on them. 
  • When you have enough coins, buy a basic ball from the top left.
  • Upgrade balls, use power-ups and pass as many levels as you can. 
  • The number on the brick indicates how many times it needs to be hit to break. As you pass more and more levels, you will see much higher numbers on bricks. So you should increase the clicking power, as well.
  • Start destroying blocks by clicking on them. 
  • When you have enough coins, buy a basic ball from the top left.
  • Upgrade balls, use power-ups and pass as many levels as you can. 
  • The number on the brick indicates how many times it needs to be hit to break. As you pass more and more levels, you will see much higher numbers on bricks. So you should increase the clicking power, as well.

    • Balls

    In the game, you can acquire balls using your coins. Whenever you get the first ball of each type, a new type of ball unlocks. 

    In addition, you can improve your balls' speed range and power. Max them up in the Upgrades section. Learn about the types of balls below.

    • Basic: Very slow and ineffective alone. Upgrade the speed and power of the ball and employ a number of them to get results from the basic ball
    • Plasma: Much faster than the basic ball, it will cause splash damage to bricks. You should improve its range.
    • Sniper: Bounces of Walls towards the nearest brick. Fast and powerful.
    • Scatter Ball: $10000 to unlock the first one. Creates additional single-hit balls. Very effective in cleaning the rooms.
    • Cannon Ball: Smashes through bricks and vital after 2nd and 3rd prestige. 
    • Poison Ball: The last ball to unlock. When a poison ball hits a brick, the brick becomes infected and takes double the damage from any other ball.
  • Basic: Very slow and ineffective alone. Upgrade the speed and power of the ball and employ a number of them to get results from the basic ball
  • Plasma: Much faster than the basic ball, it will cause splash damage to bricks. You should improve its range.
  • Sniper: Bounces of Walls towards the nearest brick. Fast and powerful.
  • Scatter Ball: $10000 to unlock the first one. Creates additional single-hit balls. Very effective in cleaning the rooms.
  • Cannon Ball: Smashes through bricks and vital after 2nd and 3rd prestige. 
  • Poison Ball: The last ball to unlock. When a poison ball hits a brick, the brick becomes infected and takes double the damage from any other ball.

    • Achievements

    The achievement section will guide you on what to aim for in the game. There are 12 of them that you can acquire.

    • 1 million total damage with basic ball
    • 1 million total damage with plasma
    • 1 million total damage with sniper
    • 1 million total damage with cannonball
    • 1 million total damage with poison ball
    • Use all power-ups.
    • Prestige 5 times.
    • Have 10 of each ball.
    • Break 1.000 black bricks.
    • Reach level 250
    • Unlock all 4 lasers.
    • Break 1 million bricks.

    • Power-Ups

    You have 5 power-ups that you can use throughout the game. Except for the x2 Gold power-up, they all boost the brick-breaking performance for 30 seconds. Access them in the upgrades section as well.

    • Cashed Up: Earn double the money.
    • Click Frenzy: Clicks spawn scatter balls or do x10 damage.
    • Demon Core: Deals waves of damage. Very effective and lets you pass a few levels at once.
    • Snow Ball: Gains power and speed with every bounce.
    • 2X Gold: Can only be used on a gold brick

    • Save Progress in Idle Breakout

    You haven't played Idle Breakout for hours, only to lose your progress when you close the tab. Your progress is saved in your browser cache, so you can continue where you left off next time and enjoy some passive income in the game.

    By any chance, if you'd like to save the progress locally and delete your browser history, head over to the settings section and click export to back up your progress. Copy the code given in the pop-up. Import by pasting the same code the next time you enter the game. 

    Controls

    Computers

    • Left-click on bricks to break
  • Left-click on bricks to break

    • Mobile and Tablet

    • Tap on bricks to break

    What to Play Next?

    Check out our newest release if you enjoy playing idle games like this. Spacebar Clicker is a game in which you employ boomer moms and booster monkeys to press the spacebar. It's absolutely absurd and a fun way to waste some time while waiting for a meeting to end or a bus to arrive at your stop. We hope you have fun playing the games we offer. If you have any inquiries, do not hesitate to contact us!

name: Burnout City
description:
Burnout City is a place where the night never ends. The streets of a hill-climbing city will be your playground. Your toys? Eleven awesome cars with lots of tuning options. Here in Burnout City, you'll be playing more than a plain online racing game. Chasing thrills, pulling off insane drifts, dodging the fuzz in epic mafia-style chases and many other challenges await you!

Controls

  • Throttle: W
  • Brake: S
  • Steering: A/D
  • Handbrake: Space
  • NOS: F
  • Gear Neutral: N
  • Change Camera: C
  • Look Back: B
  • Low Beam Lights: L
  • High Beam Lights: K
  • Gear Shift Up: Shift
  • Gear Shift Down: Control
  • Indicator Hazard: Z
  • Indicator Left: Q
  • Indicator Right: E
  • Start/Stop Engine: I
  • Respawn: R
  • Gear 1-5: Press number keys from 1-5

    • How to Play Burnout City

    • With 11 vehicles, from monstrous trucks to sleek F1 cars, pick the beast that matches your style.
    • Peek into the garage to scope out each car's stats and upgrade potential. Need for speed? Seek a lightweight car like the Porsche 993. Prefer engine power on those hills? Monster Truck comes to the help. Or Would you like to master maneuvers on those tight turns? Then, stick with a car with extreme handling performance.

    • Customization Options

    Next, head to the customization menu and make your car scream your personality. Explore them all, from slick paint jobs to neon underglow. You have an unlimited supply of in-game currency, so make sure your car stands out without any budget concerns. If you run out of money, simply go back to the main menu and click "add money" button. It's like magic! A car game cheat has never been this obvious. So, go all out to enjoy your ride! Here's what you've got in the customization menu:

    • Paint: From matte black to neon green, paint your ride to reflect your soul.
    • Wheels: Choose rims that spin right or wide or just look downright wild.
    • Mechanic: Tune your cambers, suspension, and brakes. Make every part sing your tune.
    • Upgrades: Max out your car's potential. Leave no part left behind.
    • Spoilers: Add some air to your flair. Make your car cut through the wind and look cool doing it.
    • Decals: Slap on some street cred with decals that just look rad.
    • Neons: Light up the night with underglow that turns heads and lights up the streets. Pro Gamer Tip: neon lights look awesome, especially on the Midnight City map.
